MAAX: Designer of The Best Bathroom Experience

Innovation is MAAX's DNA, and we have been creating innovative bathware solutions since 1969. Several peer associations have honored our technological innovations for their well-designed and advanced bathroom solutions. With factories in Canada and the United States, MAAX is North America's largest bath product manufacturer, and is proud to lay the foundation for generations to come.

An enjoyable experience

At MAAX, we believe in finding new ways to enhance your success and enjoyment. We constantly strive to create the best possible bathware experience at every level.

Products at the forefront of innovation

With over 80 patents granted, groundbreaking products like Utile and a focus on installation features, our commitment to innovation is part of our DNA.

Considering BC Window Replacement?

You’ve come to the right place! Centra manufactures and installs high-performance, custom-made vinyl windows and exterior doors that are designed to boost home comfort all year round and cut energy bills down to size. If you’re looking to have new windows installed, Centra is here for you – and with 40 years of experience and an exceptional, industry-leading warranty, it’s no wonder we’re the #1 choice of BC homeowners. Book your free consultation today! If you're interested in securing a government window rebate, check out our Rebate Calculator to see if you qualify.

View Promotions

The Top Choice for New BC Windows & Doors

A Local Window Company

These are true Canadian windows, made right here in the province. They’re designed with the local climate top of mind, which is why so many local homeowners consider them the best windows available.

No Outsourcing

Our manufacturers and installers are full-time Centra Owners, meaning we control the quality and safety every step of the way. They’re paid by the hour, not by the product or install, meaning the focus is on quality rather than speed.

Award-Winning Window Company

Centra is the most awarded local window company, with Canada’s Best Managed, Canada’s Most Admired Corporate Culture, and plenty more accolades under our belt!

40+ Years Experience

We've been in business since 1984, making us one of the most experienced local window firms. If you’re looking to make a door or window purchase, you want a company that has proven it stands the test of time.

Choose the Centra Family

If you’ve been looking for a window of opportunity, congratulations! You’ve found it. Bring your expertise to a place where your entrepreneurial spirit will be valued. It’s time to start working for a company you own!

Exceptional Window Warranty

Our 30-year warranty covers the glass, the frame, AND the window installation! Most ‘lifetime’ warranties only cover 20-25 years. Always ask window companies for the details of their warranty.

100% Employee Owned

OWN IT! It’s even on the back of our shirts. You can rest easy knowing your energy-efficient windows and doors have been crafted and installed with extra love and care by company Owners.

#1 for Window Installation

Unlike many window manufacturers, Centra can install the energy-efficient windows and doors we make. This means homeowners are only dealing with one company, making the window replacement process much smoother.

Windows & Doors for Your Home

When it comes to upgrading house windows and doors, you deserve the best. You want secure, energy-efficient windows that look great, boost your home comfort, and cut down those energy bills. We also offer custom-made, high-performance Centra Doors. Whether it’s front doors, patio doors, or French doors, you want something that will make a statement and keep you warm in the winter and cool in the summer. And if you’re looking for a government window rebate, don’t worry – we have plenty of high-performance products that qualify!

Trusted BC Window Suppliers and Installers

Centra is the top window manufacturer in BC for Builders, engineers, architects, and property owners. We supply energy-efficient windows and doors for new construction projects, offering innovative solutions to bring down costs while boosting product performance. In addition, we offer window and door replacement services and building envelope restoration and remediation for multifamily buildings, with over 500 large-scale strata complexes under our belts. There’s a reason they call us the Experts!

FOR THE PROS
Builders & Contractors

Centra Windows has had the pleasure of working with some fantastic builders and developers in our time. Together, we have delivered developments of outstanding quality, efficiency, and performance. Partnering with trusted, reliable specialists is the best way to streamline and improve your process and identify areas to save costs. Given our wealth of experience, we can be those experts for you, as we have been for so many.

View Builders & Contractors Page

We can Talk Windows & Doors Allll Day Long…

Whether it’s over a coffee, a conference call, or even a dinner date, our Geeks never fail to bring up windows – and they’re more than happy to share their knowledge so you can become window-fluent too! Whether you’re interested in the latest window technology, maintenance tips, the difference between casement windows and sliders, securing an energy rebate, or the benefits of Centra Glass, you can find everything you need to know on our blog!

Software Development Process We Follow
Analysis and Planning

1

One of our sales representatives will connect to understand your requirements and business goals. Then, we assign a team that analyzes your project’s aspects in detail to create the right digital product. This team also lays the groundwork for your project by planning resource allocation, cost estimation, and scheduling.

Design and Prototyping

2

The design team then proceeds with prototypes and design by implementing the UI/UX plan and guidelines. Our design experts will ask for your corporate logo, color, and image preferences to ensure your product design resonates with your brand identity. The team will create the final wireframe, a functioning prototype, and a UI/UX design for your final approval.

Software Development

3

This is the most crucial and longest step in the product lifecycle. Our expert team of developers builds a clean and efficient product based on the software design documentation, ensuring we meet all your needs. We also promise complete transparency throughout the process and ensure you are informed of all the progress and milestones attained.

Quality Assurance

4

We assure you of quality before delivering your software solution with all the essential features and functionalities your business needs. We consider it our duty to deliver a product that functions seamlessly. Our expert QA team conducts in-depth product and software testing to remove bugs and glitches and make the solution secure and ready for deployment.

Deploy Software Product

5

After tracking and fixing the bugs in the developed software product, we release the working solution to production. Our technology partner will push the code to the users and ensure a smooth product launch and successful business operations. Our team will monitor the deployment process to ensure the live software functions optimally.

Maintenance and Updates

6

As the end users start using your solution, frequent updates and security maintenance become a must to ensure the software remains bug-free and user-friendly. Our tech team offers post-deployment support to scale and update your product functionalities based on user feedback and data analytics.

FAQ’s About Custom Software Development
How much does it cost to develop a software solution?

The total development cost for a custom software solution can range from $50,000 to $250,000+, depending on the software’s complexity. To learn about the exact cost of your software, book your free consultation, and our experienced software consultant will guide you and provide the proper estimate for your project.

How much time will it take to develop software from scratch?

Custom software development from scratch, on average, takes from 4 to 12 months. The overall development time largely depends on the type, size, and complexity of the software solution needed. Connect with us to get the right timeline estimate for your software project.

How will you secure my software project information?

One of the most important measures we take to secure your software project information is signing NDAs, which guarantees that our team will do their best to protect it. In addition to signing an NDA, we apply network security measures and conduct regular virus scans to prevent unauthorized access and data breaches.

Do you provide documentation once the software is developed?

Once the software is developed, we provide software requirement specifications (SRS). The main goal of our SRS is to provide guidelines about what the software will do and how it will be expected to perform. It outlines your project’s purpose, features, and functionalities needed to fulfill your needs.

Who owns the right to the software code?

As it is your software project, you will get full ownership of your source code. We sign a legal agreement that states that source code is your intellectual property, which we hand over to you after software deployment. We ensure that you own the final version of the source code, and we do not owe any rights to your source code once it is deployed.

What if there is a change during the development phase?

As it is your idea and your project, we cater to any of your change requests. You just need to specify the changes you want to your allocated project manager. Before executing any changes, we will conduct meetings to get your approval and ensure that project development goes in the right direction.

How will you update me on the project’s progress during the software development cycle?

Your feedback is important to us as it helps us achieve the expected outcome. So, to ensure that you are involved in the project, we assign a project manager who will be your single point of contact. We set up weekly/monthly meetings to discuss the project’s progress and the upcoming milestones. Basecamp, Microsoft Teams, Skype, Slack, Zendesk, ClickUp, Notion, and Jira are some tools we use for client communications.

Do you provide maintenance support post-project deployment?

Yes, we provide 3 months of maintenance support for your software project. Although we perform all the tests before deploying any solution, errors and loopholes can arise once the project goes live. To ensure your project works smoothly, we track the interactions and resolve errors as they emerge. During the maintenance period, you can contact us anytime for any help.

Can you provide a brief description of your hiring models?

Yes, we provide three hiring models: full-time, part-time, and hourly. The full-time model boasts full-time developer availability (160 hours/month) and is suitable for enterprise and mid-size projects. Meanwhile, the part-time and hourly hiring models are ideal for start-ups and mid-size projects. Part-time models offer 80 hours/month of developer availability, while for hourly models developer availability depends on the client’s availability.

How is Space-O different from other custom software app development companies?

Space-O is a leading custom software development company in Canada, with experience serving 100+ clients and Fortune 500 companies representing various industries. What makes us different is our experience of serving various industrial niches and the in-depth technical & domain expertise we’ve gained with it. This expertise makes it easier for us to cater to your custom requirements within your budget.

Innovation. Transformation. Glass Packaging.

Glass is a material unlike any other, capable of creating stunning, memorable experiences, and it’s the most sustainable packaging material on earth. At O-I, we have a history of transforming how the world stores food and beverages – of making glass more accessible to more customers and consumers. We reimagine how glass is made and sold by innovating production techniques, pioneering recycling and sustainable technology, and unleashing the iconic, brand-building potential of this packaging that is the kindest material for the planet and its people.

OUR VISION
Shaping the Future Through Glass

We create iconic, healthy glass packaging so synonymous with brands, you recognize those brands by their packaging alone, even without a label. We innovate packaging design to enable customers to meet their own ambitions, from connecting with consumers on an emotional level to creating a more sustainable future.

OUR STORY
Driven Through Innovation

Innovation and transformation are in our DNA. O-I Glass was founded more than a century ago by a man whose glass bottle making machine was called the most significant invention in glass in 2000 years. Founder Michael J. Owens’ motto was “It can be done.” And we’re doing it. We’re reimaging what glass can do, making it the world’s most versatile, charismatic and sustainable packaging material.

OUR MISSION
Our Sustainability Vision

Glass is the ideal packaging material to support a low-waste, circular economy. But sustainability isn’t just about what we make – it’s also about how we make it. Sustainability is woven into everything we do, from transforming our glass-making technology and processes to our customer approach to how we engage our employees and support our communities.

1
2
3
Power of
Glass Packaging

Glass is pure, sustainable, and the kindest packaging material for the health of people and the planet. Glass has an element of magic to it. It is beautiful and iconic. It can turn into shapes. It plays with the senses. Glass is 100% recyclable and infinitely recyclable. It does not increase ocean pollution. Glass is virtually inert, which means it doesn’t interact with the foods and beverages it holds.

We love glass and we aspire to create a healthier, more sustainable, and more exciting world through glass packaging.

Discover Benefits of Glass
Guided by Our Values

At O-I, we deeply care about our people and our culture. Guided by our values and behaviors, we’re constantly seeking to transform how we support and engage employees and the communities in which we work and live.

ABOUT TRULITE GLASS & ALUMINUM SOLUTIONS
WHO WE ARE
Trulite Glass & Aluminum Solutions is your true single source for aluminum and glass products in Division 8 of the specifications. We offer a complete line of architectural aluminum products, fabricated glass, all glass entrances, decorative glass and mirrors.
OUR DIFFERENCE
With over 26 fabrication facilities in the US and Canada, we use our own fleet of trucks to deliver, giving us flexibility to meet our customers' needs. We have the products, equipment, and team to take projects from design with the architect to final installation by the glazing contractor.

ON TIME, ON SPEC, ON COST.
We take pride in being competitive in the market and are committed to making sure our customers' orders are on time, meet project specifications, and are cost-effective.
A TRUSTED INDUSTRY LEADER

ABOUT FAKRO

energyefficientskylights.com

Columbia is recognized by ENERGY STAR® Canada for the second year in a row. Columbia is proud to be the only skylight supplier to the Canadian market to have been recognized by ENERGY STAR® Canada.

Columbia is proud to announce that it has received its third ENERGY STAR® Canada award in four years. We thank ENERGY STAR for this recognition. It acknowledges our commitment to producing superior energy efficient skylights.

BUILT CANADIAN TOUGH
BUILT IN CANADA, BY CANADIANS, FOR THE CANADIAN CLIMATE
ENERGY STAR® Glazing Options.
Columbia offers the widest selection of ENERGY STAR® certified skylights in the industry.

All Columbia skylights, fixed or venting, standard, or custom sized are available in triple glazed configurations. Choose the right glass for our climate.
Superior Condensation Control
All Columbia skylights feature a base frame with an integrated 4-sided condensation gutter to collect moisture caused by Canada’s extreme weather.

Columbia’s Condensation Control Technology prevents water staining your lightwell, unlike imported models.
The Right Materials for the Canadian Climate
Corrosion resistant aluminum exterior frames in a choice of 7 standard colours.

Superior gasket system to ensure no air leakage, water infiltration, or heat loss.
Rigid PVC Base Frame
Skylights are windows on your roof and we duplicate leading window manufacturers with white PVC base frames to match your inside lightwell.
SEE OUR FULL RANGE OF RESIDENTIAL SKYLIGHTS
OUR PRODUCTS
Columbia Skylights
Columbia has been manufacturing skylights for over 6 decades, and over a million of our skylights grace Canadian and US homes and commercial buildings.
Fixed, Venting, Curb Mount, Self Flashing, Residential and Commercial. Skylights designed for sloped and flat roofs, integrating with any roofing material.

LEARN MORE

Commercial Skylights
Columbia is renowned for manufacturing industrial grade commercial skylights for decades. We offer a wide selection of commercial products for every application.
Bring the benefits of natural light to your factory floor, warehouse, or commercial building.

LEARN MORE

Flat Roof Skylights
Columbia manufactures a wide selection of skylights for flat roof applications, residential & commercial. Curb Mount, Sun Tubes, Roof Access Doors, and specialty skylights.
FAKRO produces a range of exceptional flat roof skylights, including the revolutionary DXW Flat Walkable Skylight.

LEARN MORE

Custom Size Skylights
Columbia offers the widest selection of sizes on the market – but we know not every project is standard. As a result, we offer our extensive custom skylight ordering program.
Any model, fixed or venting, any glass or acrylic, any frame colour.

LEARN MORE

Sun Tubes
Columbia sun tubes provide natural light to darker smaller areas in your home, such as closets, hallways, kitchens, and bathrooms.
Columbia offers a wide range of sun tubes and accessories to suit the requirements of any installation.

LEARN MORE

FAKRO Premium European Skylights
Columbia Manufacturing Co. Ltd. is proud to be the exclusive Canadian distributor of FAKRO skylights, roof windows and flat roof skylights in Canada.
Bringing this range of exceptionally designed premium European products to Canadian consumers.

LEARN MORE

WHY COLUMBIA
WHY SKYLIGHTS
ENERGY STAR® & SUSTAINABILITY
All Columbia skylights, fixed or venting, standard or custom sized are available in ENERGY STAR® certified double and triple glazed configurations.
Columbia was recognized by ENERGY STAR with the prestigious 2021 Sustained Excellence and the 2022 and 2024 Special Recognition awards for our commitment to manufacturing energy efficient products. We are dedicated to the goals of the program and continually strive to produce the best skylight products for the Canadian consumer.
LEARN MORE
WHY COLUMBIA
THE RIGHT SIZE FOR EVERY APPLICATION
The largest selection of standard sizes in the
industry offers our customers a real advantage. Customers can pick what they want without compromising on appearance.
Custom Sizes Available: any model, any glass type, any frame type, fixed & venting. If you’re replacing an existing skylight, you don’t have to incur additional expenses by modifying the roof opening to fit available standard size choices.
LEARN MORE
ABOUT US
OVER 65 YEARS OF HIGH PERFORMANCE SKYLIGHTS
Many imported skylights are designed for a more temperate climate and lack the performance and durability.
Columbia has spent over five decades manufacturing high quality skylights designed to out perform the harsh Canadian climate.
Every aspect of the skylight has been studied, engineered and tested, using the best materials available, including the latest glass technology.
LEARN MORE
HELP & ADVICE
DESIGN SUPPORT & CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our Customer Service team is here to help – from the selection of the right product, correct product specification, installation consultation, help with an order, or an update on delivery.
Call us when you are planning your project or skylight replacement, or if you have a lighting issue you don’t know how to solve. We are here to help.
LEARN MORE
WHY COLUMBIA
SEVEN STANDARD & UNLIMITED CUSTOM FRAME COLOURS
Choose from seven standard frame colours, or custom colour to match your roofing materials or window trim.
Architects design natural light into the interior of the home; however, they want the skylight to blend with your roof colour.
Contrasting the skylight frame with your roof colour can be unattractive and an eyesore.
Unlimited Custom Frame Colours to match every roof. Bring in a paint chip to your dealer, and we will match it.
LEARN MORE
WHY COLUMBIA
THE MOST GLAZING OPTIONS IN THE INDUSTRY
The widest range of double and triple glazing in the industry. More ENERGY STAR® skylights than any other manufacturer.
Columbia’s glazing options are available on all models, fixed & venting, standard & custom sizes.
Columbia has the widest range of ENERGY STAR® certified skylights in Canada.
LEARN MORE

We used Columbia Skylights in our renovation and are thrilled with the result. We have nine skylights, five of which open. The product quality is terrific, customer service exceptional and they met Vancouver’s stringent energy efficiency guidelines. Highly recommend.

– Heather H

We had a wonderful experience. Originally, we purchased our Columbia skylights through a dealer. When we realized we had likely not ordered the correct skylights for our application, we contacted Columbia directly. Thankfully, Judy sorted our order out to ensure we had the correct product and connected us to a great installer. From that point forward, we were “taken care of” and now the skylights are installed. We are very pleased with the skylights, and can’t say enough about the great service we received from both Columbia and the installer.

– Lind

Excellent service… worked with Columbia customer service department on a single one time order and was given the best service in a long time. I bought a double glazed aluminum frame skylight for my motor home that exceeded the original by many times. The original was like a blister pack, Columbia Skylights has an aluminum frame with pressure seals and a full aluminum case. As an engineer, I really appreciate the excellent design. The slight extra cost is well worth the additional money. I had a major failure of the original skylight that caused extensive damage. This skylight will outlast me. I did not get any special consideration for writing this review and normally would not take the time, but this company is worth the effort.

– Robert L

Columbia supplied all the skylights in our house including two that open with motors. The product is first class and their customer service is fantastic. We had an issue with one and they fixed it with a smile within two days. I highly recommend them.

– Jo F

Bought an 8’ x 8’ three layer skylight and after installation the snow stayed on it, even when it is 22 degrees Celsius inside our home. A very good insulation factor and is well worth the little extra it cost up front. We also get a lot of comments on how nice it looks and how much light it provides. I would certainly use Columbia on our next home.

– Clarence L

A superlative company, with a phenomenal product, exemplary customer service and product satisfaction. Fantastic shopping experience and aftercare. Could not be happier!

– Ros K

Just want to say thank you to Gord for all of his help on the skylight. If you want #1 service and great quality products Columbia Skylights is the place. thank you again Gord for all your help.

– Luigi D

Awesome products and great service. Support a local company and buy Columbia skylights.

– Darren M

Spoke to Katelyn, very friendly and most helpful….great experience.

– Craig T

HIGH-QUALITY BOTTLES, JARS AND PACKAGING COMPONENTS
OUR BUSINESS IS PACKAGING YOUR BUSINESS

For over 60 years Ampak has been committed to producing high-quality bottles, jars and packaging components for the health and beauty, industrial and automotive, food and beverage as well as pharmaceutical-nutraceutical industries. From start to finish, our objective is simple: maintain a clear understanding of our customers’ requirements throughout the design, production and delivery processes and constantly exceed our customer’s expectations. Our qualified in-house team works with our valued customers to provide an extensive A to Z packaging experience.

PLASTIC MATERIALS PET, HDPE, LDPE, PP, PS, AND PVC

Our capacities include injection molding, extrusion blow molding and reheat blow molding.  Our packaging components range from plastic materials including PET, HDPE, LDPE, PP, PS, and PVC, as well as glass wide mouth and glass narrow neck containers.   In our ongoing effort to offer an A to Z packaging solution, we also offers high-quality screen printing and labeling, shrink sleeving, heat transfer and pressure sensitive sleeving.  Ampak also manufacture and distribute a wide range of closures. We carry over 1000 molds in inventory and use FDA resins.

PERSONALIZED PACKAGING SOLUTION

Not finding what you are looking for on our website? We will work together to create a fully personalized packaging solution that perfectly meets your custom needs. Ampak’s message is clear: no one is turned away and a solution must be found for all packaging challenges...  after all, our business is packaging your business!

Walker Glass Company Ltd.

Walker Glass is the premiere manufacturer of acid-etched glass and mirror and bird-friendly glass for the North American architectural market. Our products contribute to stunning and sustainable building envelopes and interiors across the continent. We’re also a leader in sustainable manufacturing, so our glass can help you meet your environmental goals and enlighten your world.

New Blog Article

New Life for a Landmark – The Bird Friendly Glass Pyramid of the National Aquarium

The renovation of the National Aquarium’s iconic glass pyramid not only restored its visual appeal but also brought the structure up to modern environmental and wildlife conservation standards. Following the goals of the National Aquarium and the team at Design Collective, Walker was able to provide high-performance glass that combines energy efficiency, bird safety, and optimal daylighting.

Since 1942

Walker Glass began as one entrepreneur’s dream back in 1942, a small artisanal mirror shop serving local clients. The ensuing decades have seen Walker grow into one of North America’s leading glass and mirror manufacturers, with customers and partners all over the continent. Despite all these changes, the most important things have stayed the same: our core values of respect and responsibility, and the quality of our relationships with our clients, partners, and employees.

Committed to a healthy environment

Interstyle is taking significant long-term action to ensure that we have a minimal effect on the environment both pre and post production. We are constantly evaluating all stages of our manufacturing processes, minimizing waste, reusing and recycling materials wherever possible while enacting energy conservation best practices.

We are committed to crafting the highest quality products that are made in North America and to working with our employees to develop a sustainable and enjoyable working environment.

Innovation is at the core of everything that we do and remains a key driver of our success. As a truly environmentally responsible product, glass is 100% recyclable and can be recycled endlessly without losing its quality or purity. It is made from readily-available domestic materials, such as sand, soda ash, limestone and “cullet” the industry term for furnace-ready recycled glass.

We would love for you to visit Interstyle and see for yourself what we do. Just call to set-up a tour.

Une entreprise familiale et québécoise!

Chef de file dans la fabrication de systèmes de portes

Decko est un chef de file canadien dans la fabrication de portes destinées au marché résidentiel. Diversité des styles et des matériaux, qualité supérieure, prix concurrentiels, livraison rapide et service hors pair : voilà autant d’atouts qui nous valent la confiance de nos clients. Nos produits innovateurs et performants sont à l’image de notre vision d’avenir : concevoir des portes qui en mettent plein la vue!

À propos de Decko

L’innovation est au cœur de l’ensemble de nos activités

Fabriquées à partir des produits et systèmes développés par notre compagnie-sœur Soniplastics, les portes Decko bénéficient des plus récentes innovations réalisées au sein de l’industrie. L’intégration de ces technologies de pointe procure à nos produits des qualités fonctionnelles supérieures et un niveau de performance élevé dans tous les contextes d’installation. De la conception à l’assemblage final, rien n’est laissé au hasard pour offrir les meilleures portes-patio sur le marché.

Les collections Decko sont conçues spécifiquement pour être complémentaires à celles de Soniplastics, formant ainsi une famille agrandie de produits dont les matériaux, les configurations et les couleurs sont similaires. Cette complémentarité permet d’assurer un agencement parfait de toutes les ouvertures d’un même immeuble et une qualité esthétique supérieure à l’ensemble de votre projet.

Apprenez-en plus sur nos activités de recherche et développement.

Armored Vehicles

Provide maximum protection and optical clarity with bullet-resistant transparencies in armored civilian and commercial vehicles and boats. Our armored specialty glass is suitable for VIP limousines, personal cars, trucks, SUVs, as well as armored vehicles for corporations and private security companies.

LEARN MORE

Complex Windshield Shapes

The shape of railway windshields has evolved as the next generation of trains becomes more aerodynamic. CGS stays ahead of the trends with our windshield specialty-glass designs to ensure these vehicles will always be at their most efficient.

LEARN MORE

Certification

Custom Glass Solutions is ISO 9001-2015 Certified and offers a complete line of specialty-glass windshields and side window systems certified in accordance with United States and Canadian railway standards.

LEARN MORE

About NASG

NASG products by Custom Glass Solutions (CGS), with history back to 1965, are specialty glass products and assemblies for light and heavy rail, locomotives, military, security and more with a focus on armored glass & glazing, polycarbonate windows, metro glass and bullet-resistant glass.

With its NASG engineered glass solutions, CGS is one of the largest safety and security specialty-glass producers in the United States, serving customers worldwide with high-performance transparency systems for architectural, armored vehicles, railways and other specialty applications.

Our Specialties

Testimonials
A few words from our community
View all

Our client required a hygienic and reliable means to provide patient privacy to sliding glass ICU doors. Unicel Architectural Vision Control became the premier choice for ease of use and error proof operation. The results met the quality and schedule expected for a state of the art, fifty-eight bed critical care addition. Excellent documentation and rapid replies to questions provided confidence to the design and construction team that Unicel Architectural was a team player for excellence. Unicel Architectural Vision Control systems are unmatched and the primary product we trust for integrated louvers.

David J. Peronnet
NCARB, AIA (Principal / Project Architect, PF&A Design)

As a provider of clinical healthcare settings, I know how concerned our clients have been during the pandemic with time-consuming cleaning on window blind and shade applications. Front surface-only applications are easier to clean than front and glass surface-side applications shade products. This is why I have recommended use of integrated louver systems in desired sterile, semi-sterile, and even in specific non-sterile environments; it surpasses the clean and hygienic performance of traditional shades and blinds – plus, their strings and cords are often dangerous for many of the patients for which we design. Vision Control’s integrated louvers eliminate the need for strings and they require no maintenance because they’re behind glass. Through Vision Control, our clients’ staff have far better control of safety, privacy, light, temperature, and sound for every patient, a goal for every Healthcare Architect.

Jay Pelton
RA, LEED AP (Principal Sr Project Architect, Array Architects)

As a nurse working with critical ICU patients in Baltimore hospitals, the Vision Control louvered glazing makes my job much easier. The privacy it provides to patients in vulnerable times can make the world of a difference. The ease in use helps make it almost second nature to constantly use these during a shift. It is able to provide privacy, while still being functional for hospital staff to keep an eye on patients and their vital signs.

Victoria Luc
Registered Nurse at Baltimore area hospital, MD

WE ARE GLASS EXPERTS Zenan Glass brands over 12 million units per year,  over 1,000,000 units per month in our facilities which specialize in beer glasses, spirits glasses, wine glasses and glassware accessories for the food and beverage industry. This experience has made Zenan the chosen glassware decorators for some of the largest beer, liquor and wine brands in Canada and North America. With the fastest turnaround time and the largest on-hand inventory in the industry, their clients can rely on their unmatched service and capabilities.
LEARN MORE
BEER GLASSES
MUGS
COCKTAIL GLASSES
WHISKY GLASSES
WINE GLASSES
BAR TOOLS
GROWLERS
SPORTS COLLECTION
EDUCATION AND INNOVATION The team of glassware experts and glassware decorators at Zenan feel that it is important that clients have as much up-to-date information as possible. For this reason, glassware education and glassware innovation is a primary focus. Zenan works hard to ensure that their clients choose the right glass for the right beverage so they work with many of them to develop and manufacture new glassware designs from concept to final product. To take their service and education to the next level, they have developed and trademarked Zenan Flavour Discovery, working with one of Canada’s top beer educators. This unique program educates their customers about how to choose beer glasses and how to define and match flavours to the right glass. This program has re-defined how customers view and experience beer and, as a result, benefits the end user. You won’t find anyone that knows more about glass and branding in North America than Zenan!
BEER GOES HERE
Zenan has the perfect beer glass to match each unique brew, ensuring your experience matches the intended optimal taste and flavour of beer. Enjoy unlimited inventory and customization options all in-house!
LEARN MORE
PERFECT YOUR CRAFT
The world of Craft Beer has exploded over the last few years. Your patience and attention to detail deserves the right glassware. Let us help you ensure you match glassware to your Beer experience!
LEARN MORE
RAISE YOUR SPIRITS
From traditional and old fashioned to trend setting and unique, you will be able to find spirits glasses to satisfy your needs for any occasion. Home, bar, restaurant or event, let us customize your glassware and make it your own.
LEARN MORE
DO A WEDDING FAVOUR
Planning your wedding? Looking for unique wedding favours and gifts? Zenan can customize glassware and accessories exactly how you've dreamed for your big day and leave people with a keepsake they will actually keep!
LEARN MORE
IT'S OK TO WINE
Enjoy the largest in-house selection of Stemware in North America, with unique and flexible options for the wine connoisseur or occasional wine enthusiast! Complete with accessories and the ability to customize almost any glass, Zenan is the only choice for quality stemware.
LEARN MORE
STAY ON TREND
Stay up to date and on trend with the latest in glassware and accessories for your home, bar or restaurant. Zenan Glass will keep you informed with information and access to the most innovative products on the market today.

Your Custom Glass Fabrication Experts

Adriatic Glass & Mirrors is proud to craft quality glass, priced right, and delivered with excellence. We specialize in commercial and industrial glass products for a variety of industries, including store fixtures and furniture.

Our Glass & Mirror Offerings
Crafting Custom Glass & Mirror Products in Concord, Ontario

At Adriatic Glass & Mirrors, we blend art with function to provide custom glass products that exceed expectations.

Since 1969, we’ve served a diverse clientele across Canada and into the Midwest and Northeastern United States. Our state-of-the-art glass manufacturing equipment and technology ensure each of our float glass and mirror projects shine with perfection. Best of all? Our direct-to-customer model and dedication to top-tier service provide you with unbeatable quality and rapid delivery.

What Makes Us the Best Choice
Discover Quality & Expertise: The Difference is Clear

Service & Commitment As We Grow

Our commitment to premium service highlights our dedication to providing top-quality products and timely delivery.

Learn More

Our Facility & Equipment

We utilize cutting-edge equipment in our 35,000 sq ft facility, delivering you a diverse array of products, finishes, and custom designs.

Learn More

Our Fabrication Expertise

Our expert team collaborates closely with you, working together to create tailored glass solutions to meet your unique requirements.

Learn More

Acid Etched Glass

Our acid-etched glass products offer a perfect balance of privacy and light. We can customize your glass with acid etching for a decorative frosted effect that is easy to maintain and made to last.

Learn More
DFI Glass Coatings

Protect and preserve the beauty of your glass with our advanced Diamond Fusion International (DFI) coating and other coating technologies, ideal for extending the life of commercial glass installations.

Learn More
Crystal Clarity with Low Iron Glass

For applications where clarity is paramount, our Starphire low iron glass provides unmatched transparency without the green tint commonly seen in standard glass.

Learn More
Specialty Glass Products

Our specialty glass products are designed to meet specific architectural needs in a variety of projects. We can provide specialty glass solutions for all your glazing needs.

Learn More
Custom Tempered Glass

Ideal for high-traffic areas, our tempered glass products offer exceptional strength and safety, making them a staple in shower doors, railings, glass doors, tables, and more.

Learn More
Laminated Glass

Enhance security and acoustic performance with our laminated glass products, designed for demanding commercial environments like hotels.

Learn More
Custom Annealed Glass

Our annealed glass, made from premium float glass, is versatile and customizable to fit the unique requirements of any project, ensuring flexibility across various applications.

Learn More
Custom Mirrors

From fitness centers to bathrooms, our custom mirrors combine functionality with aesthetic appeal, tailored to your specific design needs.

Learn More

Solutions for All Glass Professionals
Glaziers

We understand the needs of glaziers. Our solutions are highly customizable to ensure they get the specialty glass products they need – when they need them.

Learn More
Railing Companies

We provide railing companies with safety-focused, aesthetically pleasing glass solutions, designed to enhance both the security and style of any space.

Learn More
OEMs

Adriatic Glass partners with OEMs to provide high-quality, precision-engineered glass components, ensuring just-in-time delivery for seamless product integration.

Learn More
Store Fixture Industry

Our custom glass solutions enhance the aesthetic and functionality of retail environments, offering durability and visual appeal for store fixtures and displays.

Learn More
Millwork Companies

Adriatic Glass delivers meticulously crafted glass components tailored to meet the detailed demands of millwork companies in both functionality and design.

Learn More
Hotel Contract Furniture Companies

Our custom glass for hotel furniture combines durability, safety, and elegance to elevate guest experiences and interior aesthetics.

Learn More
General Contractors

We supply general contractors with reliable, top-quality glass for large-scale projects, supporting timely completion with consistent communication and service.

Learn More
Don’t See Your Industry or Profession?

Every project is unique, and so are our solutions. If you don’t see your industry listed, we’re still equipped to help. Let’s discuss how our custom glass solutions can meet your specific needs.

Reach Out
Versatile Applications for Every Space

We deliver tailored glass solutions for a wide array of applications, from enhancing corporate offices with sleek, modern aesthetics to providing the hospitality industry with durable and beautifully crafted glass furnishings.

Glass Offices for Modern Workspaces
Innovative Glass Solutions for Office Furniture

Custom Glass Solutions for Healthcare Applications
Our Glass & Mirrors are Compliant With ASTM and ANSI Requirements

All our glass and mirror products are rigorously tested and certified to meet ASTM Glass and Ceramic Standards and the American National Standards for safety glazing materials. Our products adhere to specific tempering and laminated spec codes, including CAN/CGSB-12.1-M90, CAN/CGSB-12.2-M91, and ANSIZ97.1. In the USA, our mirrors comply with ASTM C 1503-18 (2018) for Silvered Flat Glass Mirrors, and in Canada, they meet the CAN/CGSB – 12.5 – M86 TYPE 1B National Standard of Canada for Mirrors, Silvered.

OUR FIRM

From our humble beginnings in 2005, to our present-day status as Manitoba's premier glass and mirror fabricators, our mandate has remained the same:

To be an extension of our customers' business.

We have the capacity, technology and experience to deliver on the most complicated specifications that architects and designers create.

As an owner-operated company, we understand the critical nature of our customers' work; and as true partners, we believe in taking full responsibility for the promises we make. We promise to listen to your unique needs and challenges, and communicate honestly should we foresee an issue or a better way to do things. We consistently exceed our customers' expectations by meeting production, delivery and timing criteria other fabricators simply can't, or won't.

We believe purchasing a glass or mirror product should be a one-time occurrence in a project's lifespan. That's why all our products are warranty-backed, and made to last.

Who the “H” is “Humphrey”?


A “H”istory of Excellence
Humphrey is a Winnipeg based window and door manufacturer that has been satisfying customers in Western Canada for more than 50 years. We got our start when a group of window dealers combined in their search for higher quality windows and doors that could match the quality of their installations. The rest is a long history of excellence in designing, developing, manufacturing and supplying quality window and door products, built for the ever changing climate of the prairies.

Humphrey is focused on serving window and door professionals; renovators, contractors, glass shops, exterior specialists and discerning builders, looking for a product that will stand up and a manufacturer that will stand behind its products. Our warranties speak for themselves. We stand behind what we build. Tell me more…

“NXT Generation” Window and Door Systems

Humphrey “NXT Generation” window and door systems means a dedication to continual improvement in window and door design, quality and performance.

Humphrey windows and doors incorporate:

• The highest quality materials
• Tested and proven hardware
• The latest in energy efficient low-e glass and glass packages.
• Over fifty years of manufacturing experience
• Dedicated and accountable quality control process
• The latest technologies to enhance the performance of the glass, hardware, and operation of the window
Tell me more…

Made-to-Measure Precision

Every window is made to fit your exact specifications, can be fully customized to fit the design of your home or business, tested to exceed industry standards and based on precise measurements taken on-site by a Preferred Humphrey Dealer.

Quality Guarantee

Humphrey has developed its own unique and comprehensive quality control system, where through the use of state-of-the-art equipment, heavily researched and individually selected components, and favorable warranties has earned a reputation of providing outstanding value to our dealers and their customers. With thousands of windows and doors being shipped across Western Canada each year, Humphrey stands behind what we sell! Should something be found wrong in our product due to manufacturing error, or product defect, contact your “Preferred Humphrey Dealer” and they’ll take care of you. Tell me more…

Professional and Efficient Glass Services in Victoria

Glass products add elegance when installed in your bathroom, living room, or office. At Allied Glass & Aluminum Products Ltd, we install glass doors and windows in your home or office, do glass repairs, and install skylights, sunrooms, showers, and railings. Our customers include individual homeowners, builders, contractors, developers, property managers, and commercial building owners who look for quality glass products. In addition, if you are looking for professionals providing glass services in Victoria and Southern Vancouver Island, Allied Glass & Aluminum Products Ltd is the right choice.

 

 

Why Go for Glass?

Glass provides a feeling of space and lends a timeless, elegant look to any property. Glass offers versatility, functionality and durability, making it the perfect choice for interiors and decor in homes and offices. At Allied Glass & Aluminum Products Ltd, we ensure expert installation. We offer customized glass and aluminum elements to complement and enhance the interiors of your premises. Our professionals can provide you with glass panels, frameless glass doors for windows, glass shelves, aluminum and glass railings and a range of other installations to suit your interiors.

Residential Glass

Professionally installed glass offers a timeless look. 

Residential Glass

Commercial Glass

Improve the appeal and function of your business by installing glass office partitions that also provides more light throughout the office. We install beautiful products with precision craftsmanship. Display your products by getting a new glass showcase installed by us.

Commercial Glass

Glass Repair

Whether it's a broken window, a break-in at your home or business, a glass door repair, or just an accident, we are standing by to help. Don’t let broken glass affect your security and avoid injury.

Glass Repair

Skylights

 Open up the feel of any space by letting in more natural light and provide a sense of space. Our custom-built products are energy efficient and adaptable to your needs. Our fabricators build custom skylights in our facility and provide off the shelf skylights for your home as well.

Skylights

Sunrooms

Add square footage to your home and make the most of your view with a new solarium, aluminum and glass canopy or awning from Allied Glass & Aluminum Products Ltd. Installing a new sunroom can add style and value to your residential property.

Railings

Emergency Services

In the event of a broken window or a shattered pane of glass, you can't always wait for the next day to deal with the problem. For all your emergency needs, we are here to help you.

Emergency Services

We have a solid reputation in the Greater Victoria area.
Here's why:

Allied Glass & Aluminum Products Ltd has served the Greater Victoria area for 60 years, operating from our well-stocked, 6,000 square foot facility in central Victoria. We have the largest selection of parts in town. Providing quality, service, and value to all our customers has been the objective of our company from the start. Our office personnel have industry experience and product knowledge. We use state-of-the-art field service software dispatched digitally to our fleet of 15 GPS equipped service vehicles. With the aim of delivering personalized attention, our customer service coordinators offer quality service. Our installers are skilled and knowledgeable Red-Seal certified glaziers who do it right the first time.


Our technicians know and appreciate the trust our clients put in Allied Glass when we enter your home or business. We are sensitive to our customers needs and complete the task as efficiently as possible. If you need glass services in Victoria, trust Allied Glass, call us now.

Glass Repair in Victoria

Broken glass can jeopardize the safety of your family, your business and staff. Broken glass can cause injury and make your property more susceptible to robbery or theft. At Allied Glass & Aluminum Products Ltd, we fix all kinds of broken glass to restore your doors, windows, glass shelves and showcase panels to functioning condition.

Call us today to request a quote.

Commercial Glass Services

Installing glass windows, glass office partitions and doors in your commercial premises offers functionality and transparency in your office. If you are a business owner, you can benefit from glass showcases that portray your products from the outside. Glass windows and doors can significantly upgrade your curb appeal. Glass office partition walls give your employees extra light, a modern look and a sense of space.

ABOUT US

IGP GLASS is a Montreal Glazing & custom glass processing company that produces service and quality focused Glass Products for commercial, industrial and high-end residential customers.

LEARN MORE
VISIT OUR FACEBOOK PAGE 
Our mission

As established glass specialists, IGP Glass offers customers a unique offering, providing both the sourcing and supply of glass for projects that require specialist knowledge and experience, as well as the ability to deliver high-risk and complex projects. We have a dedicated team of craftsmen who are the first contact with our customers and take charge of all of our glass projects to ensure jobs are completed to Canadian safety standards. At IGP Glass, no job is too big or too small

Why us?

We like to listen to what our customers want. We pride ourselves on delivering competitively priced, optimal products on time. Our state-of-the-art machinery provides the guaranteed glass requirements for your project. With strong customer service and product delivery at a guaranteed quality level, we are able to meet the needs and expectations of our customers. We offer glass solutions for a wide variety of residential, commercial and architectural applications

THE ENOCAPSULE COLLECTION

We bring your brands to life, thoughtfully.

The Enocapsule Collection of capsules encapsulates over 20 years of experience in manufacturing PVC Heatshrink capsules, Polylaminate Polylux capsules, Champagne Foils & now, Screw Caps.
Enocapsule manufactures capsules in custom colors, custom sizes and custom prints. If you are looking for a manufacturer that can create a special color for your brand or print your logo, our team is ready to assist you with your capsule needs.

 

PVC

PVC heat shrink capsules are tamper evident secondary closures that are heat shrunk over cork finish bottles, bar top finish bottles or screw caps.

SCREW CAPS

Screw Cap capsules are tamper evident primary closures that are rolled onto the bottle neck of your bottles.

POLYLAMINATE

Polylux capsules are made from our exclusive polylux material that gives a rich and elegant look to your bottle.

CHAMPAGNE FOIL

Champagne foils can be applied automatically or manually onto bottles. Enocapsule manufactures unicolor and decorated champagne foils.

Providing quality glass services nationwide since 2000.

Bmg specializes in Aluminum and Glass projects, both Residential and Commercial. We excel at bringing design-assist and construction services for your curtain wall, window and door needs across the country.

VIEW OUR WORK
ABOUT US
Barrie Metro Glass has a proven record of success with all project sizes and all difficulty levels, from design to completion.

 

We are a full-service glazing and aluminum operation offering high quality and timely installations of curtain wall, store fronts, window walls, punched/fixed windows, entry systems, automatic doors/operators, interior glazing, glass balustrades, custom residential showers, auto/special heavy equipment, specialty and custom jobs.

Bmg SERVICES THE FOLLOWING AREAS:

 

Central & Western Ontario.
North Eastern & North Western Ontario
Central and Northern Alberta
Saskatchewan and Manitoba
Remote & Northern Canada Communities (including Fly-in only Communities)
The Maritimes
WORK WITH US
Commercial & Institutional glass.

 

Commercial/ Industrial/ Institutional (ICI) Glazing is essentially a customized glazing system designed around extruded aluminum products and various glass types as selected by the Project Designers.

VIEW OUR WORK
	
Residential glass.

 

Although the focus of bmg since our inception has historically been the commercial and institutional marketplace, we have also completed a large number of residential projects and it continues to be an expanding area of service for us, as consumers and designers realize the elegant solutions aluminum provides for homes and cottages.

VIEW OUR WORK
	
Railing systems.

 

Glass railings are becoming more common on all types of buildings as designers, building operators and owners come to understand their incredible durability and the flexibility of design available to them.

VIEW OUR WORK
	
Big Glass openings.

 

Bmg is proud to be an authorized Dealer for Big Glass Openings (BGO). BGO is a Canadian manufacturer of high-end aluminum door and window systems based on a European system engineered by Reynaers Inc. Also based in Barrie Ontario, BGO has an elegant showroom highlighting some of the options available for their bi-folding doors, lift slide patio doors, garden doors, tilt turn windows and much more.

Réalisations en vedette
Par :
Ameublements Tanguay Trois-Rivières

La Mauricie est fière d'accueillir le plus grand magasin de l'entreprise Ameublements Tanguay situé dans le District 55. Ce magasin de conception unique, grâce à sa structure intérieure de bois, offre un coup d'oeil exceptionnel et met en évidence de belle façon la variété de produits haut de gamme de Shalwin (rampe de verre, mur rideau, portes commerciales). Ce projet a été récompensé à l'occasion de la cinquième édition du gala des Prix d'excellence Cecobois dans la catégorie Bâtiment commercial de plus de 1000 m2.

Actualités
Shalwin nominée pour le prestigieux prix Maurice-Pollack
8 OCTOBRE 2020
Construire Vert | Shalwin se positionne dans le marché du bâtiment durable par l’obtention de (4) Déclarations Environnementales de Produits. (DEP)
19 FÉVRIER 2020
Ce que nous sommes

Shalwin est une entreprise, implantée à Shawinigan, spécialisée dans la réalisation de projets de fenestration haut de gamme. Shalwin fabrique et installe des portes, des fenêtres, et des murs rideaux pour tout projet commercial, institutionnel ou résidentiel, partout au Québec.

Devant la demande, Shalwin n’a cessé d’accroître ses activités. L’innovation et l’investissement, piliers sur lesquels repose la stratégie de développement de Shalwin depuis sa fondation, ont hissé l’entreprise au plus haut niveau. Pour soutenir son développement et mieux desservir sa clientèle, deux divisons ont été créées : Shalwin Contemporain, pour les projets résidentiels haut de gamme, et Shalwin EXP, pour les projets de devanture commerciale.

Shalwin est une entreprise enregistrée à la Régie du bâtiment du Québec et, à ce titre, répond aux normes les plus sévères de qualité, tant pour ce qui est de la fabrication que de l’installation de ses produits. Shalwin est en mesure de relever des défis architecturaux avec qualité et minutie grâce à des équipements à la fine pointe de la technologie, aux espaces nécessaires pour une utilisation efficace et sécuritaire et à une équipe entièrement qualifiée

Notre mission

La mission de Shalwin est de réaliser des projets de fenestration qui répondent totalement aux attentes et aux exigences de la clientèle. Pour y arriver, l’entreprise compte sur le savoir-faire d’une équipe passionnée et dynamique.

Nos trois valeurs

Qualité : Concevoir des produits et offrir des services de grande qualité est une valeur primordiale chez Shalwin et chaque membre de l’équipe déploie tous ses talents pour atteindre cet objectif.

Respect : Respecter sa clientèle et son équipe est une valeur ancrée chez Shalwin. Pour ce faire, l’entreprise répond aux besoins et aux exigences de sa clientèle par la réalisation efficiente de projets et par une offre de produits de qualité. De plus, Shalwin reconnaît les compétences de chaque membre de l’équipe en favorisant un milieu de vie stimulant, sain et sécuritaire.

Responsabilisation : Offrir les moyens aux membres de bien percevoir leurs rôles respectifs dans l’équipe et leurs effets sur la réussite de l’entreprise et la satisfaction de la clientèle.

FOCUSED ON YOU

Welcome to First Choice Vision Centre, serving you from 7 locations

BAIE VERTE -CORNER BROOK - DEER LAKE -  GRAND FALLS/WINDSOR - LEWISPORTE - ST. ANTHONY - STEPHENVILLE

First Choice Vision Centre Providing Eyewear in Newfoundland

First Choice Vision Centre is a locally owned and operated company established in 1991. The practice features 7 Vision Care locations in Newfoundland but also provides eye care services to other rural areas through remote clinics in coastal Labrador and in Southern and Central Newfoundland. 
​
When shopping for eyewear it is important to have the guidance of a friendly, experienced eyewear professional to help you make an informed decision regarding your vision care needs. First Choice Vision Centre in Newfoundland has the best team of eye care professionals to ensure you get the right product.
​
​

First Choice Vision Centre also carries Oakley , Maui Jim, Zeal & Raban . For the ultimate in comfort and style, visit your nearest store and check out our selection. First Choice also carries a large selection of contact lenses.

 

 

 

Quality and efficiency

We understand that your eyeglasses are a necessity and that you need your new eyeglasses as soon as possible. Our Technology
We design, engineer, and manufacture custom ion-strengthened screen protection for a wide variety of industry specific, custom, and off-the-shelf devices.
Phantom Glass specializes in the design, engineering, and manufacturing of custom screen protection solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of various industries. In addition to custom solutions, we offer a range of off-the-shelf products designed for smartphones and tablets. These products are equipped with advanced features including anti-reflection, anti-fingerprint, and anti-blue light coatings. Our screen protectors are crafted from the strongest and highest quality ion-strengthened glass, ensuring superior protection for devices against daily wear and tear.
Phantom Glass Features
Ion-Strengthened
Ion-strengthened tempered glass providing maximum strength and invisibility.
Scratch Resistance
Protects against scratches, ensuring your screen stays pristine.
Impact Resistance
Reliable and tested to protect against intense drops and bumps.
Easy Installation
Featuring a proprietary silicone nano-adhesion layer for bubble free installation.
Custom Manufactured
Can be custom made in reasonable MOQs for any device, regardless of shape or size.
Custom Coatings
Anti-fingerprint (standard), anti-microbial, anti-blue light, anti-reflection and more!
Case Compatible
Works with most existing standard and snug-fitting device cases.
Unbeatable Expertise
Over 10-years of industry-wide experience and millions of devices protected.
There are many key differences between Phantom Glass and traditional "tempered glass" manufacturers and products. Here are just a few of them.
Phantom Glass Vs. "Tempered Glass"
Phantom Glass is the last screen protection you'll ever need. Beyond tempered glass lies Phantom Glass. Ion-Strengthened Glass is the game changer. It provides 99.99% visual transparency, extreme impact and scratch resistance, and zero image distortion. The difference is clear... Literally.
Custom Engineered Technology
Phantom Glass's distinctiveness lies within our special glass and silicone nano-adhesion creation process. Because we manufacture Phantom Glass ourselves, we have the ability to customize it for any device, while maintaining minimal MOQs to accommodate your requirements.
Ion-Strengthened Substrate
Phantom Glass is designed using industry-leading ion-strengthened glass. With perfect visual transparency, best-in-class impact and scratch resistance, and supreme thinness, Phantom Glass is a cut above the rest, with a difference you can see!
Proprietary Coatings
Phantom Glass can be made with a wide variety of special coatings, including and not limited to anti-reflection, anti-blue light, anti-microbial and more. Because we manufacture Phantom Glass, we can make sure it meets your requirements. Keep devices cleaner for longer, while also extending their lifespan. Our anti-reflective coating technology in particular is essential for increasing usability in bright indoor and outdoor settings.
Strong
Anti-Fingerprint
Impact Resistant
Shatter-Proof
Anti-Blue Light
Anti-Reflective

Industries Served
Payment Processing
Custom component and glass screen protection for card processing hardware. Keep screens cleaner and scratch-free.
Trucking and Logistics
Protect in-cabin driver-facing hardware, and shielding from dangerous glare and impacts and scratches.
Healthcare
Protect patient and provider-facing devices with anti-microbial, durable, and anti-reflective protection.
Education
Protect faculty assets and student devices from impacts, scratches, and drops. Anti-reflective, anti-microbial, and more.
Aviation
Anti-reflective and impact-resistant protection for avionics, crew- and passenger-facing devices.
Corporate Devices
Protect your company's off-the-shelf hardware like smartphones, tablets, and laptops. Extend the life of your assets.
Automotive
HIC-approved automotive display glass protection for infotainment systems. Anti-reflective and anti-fingerprint.
Custom Devices
Our specialty is customizing Phantom Glass for any device. Low MOQs for custom tempered glass protection.
Who We Are
With over a decade of experience, Phantom Glass is the world's leading manufacturer for screen protection solutions for various industries.
Since its founding in 2013, Phantom Glass has collaborated closely with Corning, and pioneered advanced screen protection technology that meets the highest industry standards. Based in Toronto, Canada, with both offices and a cutting-edge laboratory, Phantom Glass has become a trusted name across diverse industries—including healthcare, payment processing, aviation, automotive, and transportation. From retail stores to high-security environments, Phantom Glass products have been protecting screens nationwide since their introduction. Our ISO 9001 certification underscores our unwavering commitment to quality, delivering consistent, reliable, and innovative solutions for critical applications worldwide.

We look forward to working with you and creating the perfect ion-strengthened or tempered glass screen protection for your devices.

Solera® – Light Diffusing Insulating Glass for Daylighting Perfection

Great buildings need a connection to the outdoors, one that is only achieved through the use of glass. At Advanced Glazings Ltd, we understand that making that connection is challenging. Uncontrolled sunlight causes glare and overheating that can make an otherwise beautiful space painful to be in. New building energy codes can block your way. So we created our Solera® line of highly insulating light diffusing glass, and put our decades of combined experience in daylight design at your disposal, to make it easy for you to create buildings that are stunning and will ‘wow’ everyone who enters.

LOOKING FOR AIA CREDITS?
BOOK A LUNCH AND LEARN NOW!
Solera® Means Daylighting Done Well

Explore how Solera® solves challenges to effective daylighting.

EXPLORE DAYLIGHTING DONE WELL
Permanence Means a Lifetime of Daylighting Benefits

Made from glass, Solera® is a permanent daylighting product that offers myriad visual performance characteristics that last a lifetime – unlike polycarbonate or fiber-reinforced plastics.

EXPLORE CASE STUDIES
Precise Control and Universal Integration

Seamlessly integrating with any standard curtain wall or glass framing system, Solera® allows specifiers to precisely configure and control light diffusion, visible light transmittance, and solar heat gain properties while achieving superior acoustic performance and thermal insulation up to R25.

EXPLORE CONFIGURATION OPTIONS
Superior Thermal Performance up to R25

More light does not have to mean less insulation. By incorporating aerogel, Solera® units provide insulation values up to R25.

EXPERIENCE THERMAL PERFORMANCE
The Ultimate in Beautiful, Usable, Natural Light

Solera® dials in the perfect glazing configurations for superior translucency. The result is the ideal combination of brightness and contrast, allowing for attractive, glare-free, productive spaces.

EXPERIENCE VISUAL COMFORT
Experience
the Difference.
Light Diffusing Power from Advanced Glazings

Selecting the right glazing is critical to effective and beautiful daylighting. Our advanced measurement and rating system can help you easily compare light diffusing glass products.

TC Insulating Glass

Manufacturer of Double and Triple Glazed Sealed Units

	

Dear Customer;

T.C. Insulating Glass Inc. is a manufacturer of double or triple glazed sealed units, a company committed to providing quality products and service to all of our clients. Our company ensures that our product is of the highest quality and maintains the most current technological advances in our industry.

Our operations are semi-automated allowing us to provide timely and accurate results. Our automated glass cutter, spacer bender and sealed unit line saves us time and therefore assures our clients excellent quality products.

In addition to our double glazed sealed units, we provide units with Technoform I- Spacer in white and grey, Aluminum and Black Aluminum spacer bars along with argon gas filling. We also manufacture Cardinal® CG LOË²-272, 180, 366 units. Almost twenty (20) different types of grills are provided, for instance, pencil bar in white or brass, lead bar, georgian contour bar, and a variety of aluminum bars 
in white, brass, black, brown, grey and cream. Also, we supply two-tone grills in white/sandlewood and white/cream.

For faster service we keep various types of standard tempered door lites in stock. Our aim is to test new designs that allow us to manufacture the best possible products and we stand behind our products with a full warranty*.

We invite you to contact our sales representatives if you have any inquires about our products or pricing structure. We are committed to meeting and satisfying the needs of our customers. Our dedication to service and quality is what sets us apart.

Sincerely,

Josie Dirracolo,
Sales Executive

EXTRA C-TAP IS NOW HERE!

Some like it hot. Introducing the Extra C-Tap by Vivreau: the most versatile water dispenser on the market. Choice of up to five water types: unchilled and chilled still, chilled semi-sparkling and sparkling – plus hot water on demand

Water Systems

Vivreau remains the responsible hydration brand of choice for forward-thinking organizations around the world.

Learn More
Professional Filters

Learn More
Design Center

This design center is for you: the Vivreau system owner and user, technician, distribution partner or general water enthusiast!

Learn More
Exclusive Bottles and Accessories

Custom branding is available for our entire bottle range and is a fantastic way to showcase your company’s commitment to principles of sustainability and health & wellness.

Learn More
Premium Flavors

A health-minded alternative to sugary sodas and expensive fruit-infused service. The carefully curated selection of flavours is intended to provide a quick, tasty boost to chilled sparkling or still Vivreau water. No sugar has been added, and all fruits used are sourced in the US.

Learn More
Our Partnerships

Vivreau is proud to partner with industry leaders to help them reach their sustainability and health & wellness goals. Replacing traditional bottled water with Vivreau on-site bottling systems, reusable glass bottles, and Vi Taps has helped hundreds of clients become more environmentally responsible.

“Hygiene is very important to us at Centra, and we’re very happy with the quality and taste of Vivreau water. The glass bottles with Centra Health’s logo are also a nice touch. The Vivreau system gives us an additional amenity that you do not normally see in a hospital.”

Chef Timothy Schoonmaker
CENTRA VIRGINIA BAPTIST HOSPITAL
Our Benefits

At its core, Vivreau is about sustainability, in every sense of that term, including environmental stewardship, human health and wellness, positive social change, and financial responsibility. Vivreau clients employ our systems to meet a variety of important objectives, oftentimes checking numerous boxes at once through the adoption of an integrated water solution.

Environmental Sustainability

The core of what we do. See an immediate, measurable impact on your sustainable footprint.

Health and Wellness

Water is the most essential ingredient to good health. Drink it deeply, drink it often.

Brand Building

Your name, prominently displayed on an eye-catching symbol of sustainability and wellness, for all to see.

Cost Savings

Eliminate the expensive and cumbersome habit of single-serve plastics. You’ll never look back.

QUI SOMMES-NOUS ?
POUR VOIR LE VERRE AUTREMENT
Chez Vitrerie Global, vos projets nous tiennent à cœur. Ce n’est pas pour rien que nous sommes le spécialiste à Québec pour tous vos besoins en verres et miroirs, vitres thermos, douches en verre sur mesure, portes et fenêtres en aluminium, moustiquaires, plastiques ou autre. Notre distinction : une équipe de professionnels hautement qualifiés et dévoués à vous offrir un service personnalisé incomparable. Que ce soit pour la réparation, la livraison ou l’installation, vous pouvez compter sur notre vaste expertise dans l’industrie des portes et fenêtres.

Providing innovative lighting solutions since 1986, BL Lighting manufactures specification-grade architectural lighting with a focus on dynamic, high performance, and sustainable, fiber optic, linear lighting, LED systems, and controls.

We provide complete support, and specialize in custom, tailor-made orders for architectural, hospitality, design-build, display, commercial and residential interiors or exteriors, and unique applications such as under-water, marine, extreme temperature, explosion proof, and more.

Our commitment is to explore and develop the latest of lighting technologies, to provide custom solutions, and ignite creativity in our clientele for all of their lighting endeavors.

Lighting should be functional, sustainable, and always beautiful. Lighting is our passion.

Buy Direct from the Manufacturer & Save!

Universal glass tech is a family owned company that's been established since 1993, in those last 18 years we have produced over 500,000 decorative glass units, all sizes, shapes and designs. We are very proud of the fine work and commissioned orders that we have made, from churches and synagogues and institutions, along with high end residential and commercial clients.

Since 1993 our goal has been to provide the best possible selection of decorative glass that one may chose, from our standard stock items to our custom sidelites and transoms at the best possible pricing. We pride ourselves on quality and service at universal glass tech and with the help of our dedicated and knowledgeable staff we feel that we can produce anything that you can dream up. Our longevity and expertise make us one of the leaders in the decorative glass field, and we will continue to encourage and support creative expressions in glass in the months and years to follow.

If there are any products in the stained glass field that we can not produce, we will do our best to source them out and bring them to you at wholesale pricing, we are well known in the industry and have incredible relationships with many of the other companies in the glass market, if we don't manufacture what you are looking for, then we will still be able to bring that product in and offer it at a great price.

We appreciate the great support that we have had over the last 18 years and look forward to serving the industry for many more years to come.

OBTENEZ UN DEVIS NOS SERVICES
CERTIFICATIONS
La certification SGCC (Safety Glazing Certification Council) est attribuée aux matériaux de vitrage de sécurité qui ont fait l’objet de tests rigoureux pour répondre aux normes de sécurité établies par des organisations telles que l’ANSI et le DOT. Pour obtenir la certification SGCC, il faut soumettre des échantillons à des laboratoires d’essai agréés. Si le matériau passe tous les tests requis, les fabricants reçoivent la certification, ce qui prouve leur engagement à fournir des produits sûrs et de haute qualité.
MGNA respecte toutes les normes ASTM C1036 pour le verre plat dans la fabrication du verre.
À PROPOS DE NOUS
Bienvenue à Making Glass North America

MGNA a été fondée le 1er mai 2023 en tant que fabricant de verre haut de gamme possédant une usine de pointe de 55 000 pieds carrés à Laval (Québec, Canada). Notre équipement d’origine italienne, qui comprend des marques telles que MAPPI, NEPTUN, BOTTERO, BAVELLONI, OPTIMA et DOMINO, nous permet de fournir des produits à la pointe de la technologie. Notre équipe est composée de professionnels dévoués et talentueux qui possèdent des dizaines d’années d’expérience. De concert avec notre filiale italienne, Making Glass Italy, nous proposons au marché nord-américain un verre de qualité italienne très recherché.

Joignez-vous à MGNA et, ensemble, redéfinissons l’industrie du verre.

Qualité inégalée

Notre large gamme de produits est parfaite pour tout type d’intérieur, de bâtiment commercial, ainsi que pour les condominiums de grande hauteur. Tous les verres flottés bruts MGNA sont fabriqués aux États-Unis et répondent aux normes ASTM.

Notre technologie de pointe comprend les processus suivants

Le verre est chauffé à 620 degrés Celsius puis refroidi rapidement par de l'air forcé pour le renforcer intérieurement, mettant ainsi les surfaces extérieures en compression et l'intérieur en tension. Conforme aux normes ASTM, cette forme de verre de sécurité, lorsqu'elle se brise, se fragmente en petits morceaux granulaires plutôt que de se fendre en éclats pointus.

Incorporant à la fois les dernières machines de polissage horizontales et verticales où des bords polis plats, des bords chanfreinés et des bords en onglet peuvent être obtenus.

Réalisation de découpes, de trous, d'encoches, etc., respectant des tolérances rigoureuses.

Les commandes terminées peuvent être expédiées dans des caisses en bois dur ou des supports métalliques conçus spécifiquement pour maximiser l'espace dans les remorques et offrir une protection maximale aux produits finis.

Solutions for Materials Preparation, Testing & Analysis
ABOUT BUEHLER
Buehler is a leading supplier of metallographic sample preparation and analysis instruments. Buehler’s sectioning machines, mounting machines, grinding and polishing machines, and hardness testers have the best user interfaces in the industry. Our experts in metallography can recommend the best preparation method to pair with your machine. We serve a wide variety of applications in metallurgical labs including, production, research & development, quality control, and failure analysis. Our products are used to analyze and test a wide variety of metallic and nonmetallic samples.
About Buehler

METALLOGRAPHIC PREPARATION EQUIPMENT & CONSUMABLES
SECTIONING &
CUTTING
Simple set up and time saving conveniences are core to Buehler’s sectioning products. Achieve high-quality cuts for any material. Buehler offers Abrasive Cutters, Precision Cutters, and a variety of metallurgical blades.
Sectioning
MOUNTING
 

Get the most from your mounting step with straightforward solutions for a variety of lab requirements. Choose from cold mounting (castable mounting) including epoxies and acrylics or hot mounting (compression mounting) including mounting presses and powders.

Mounting
Whether a lab is looking to reduce rework, improve surface finish, or simplify effort for the technician, Buehler has your Grinding & Polishing solution. Buehler offers grinder and polisher machines, vibratory polishers, grinding paper, and a vaiety of other grinding and polishing consumables.
Grinding & Polishing
Buehler Electrolytic Etching provides a consistent method to reveal microstructures after metallographic grinding.
Etching

OmniMet™ Image & Analysis System offers seamless point & click possibilities. Simple to use and powerfully flexible. OmniMet combines analytical power with unprecedented ease.
Image & Analysis

Fully integrated systems remove the guess work from hardness testing with intuitive interfaces and software combined with test blocks that set the standard for repeatability. The Wilson® hardness tester product range includes Rockwell®, Knoop/Vickers, and Brinell hardness testers.
