Nathan Allan Glass Studios

Nathan Allan Glass Studios head office and main factory is located in Surrey, British Columbia, Canada. We are the world’s leading manufacturer of unique and exclusive kiln-formed glass, thick glass, cast glass and architectural textured glass products. With offices throughout North America and across the world, our company has specialized in the production of hand crafted Architectural Glass and Decorative glass products since 1986. Working with high end interior designers and architects, our unique and exclusive glass products are created, shipped, and installed all over the globe.

With over 150+ unique and exclusive glass textures and designs, Nathan Allan offers the largest assembly of hand crafted Architectural Glass products. View our 60+ Classic Textures, our incredible FreeForm Collection, and our sizzling Josiah J Collection. Created for the A&D community, our Architectural Glass is used in wall partitions, balustrades, doors, dividers, storefront and facades. Nathan Allan has also designed 2 exclusive products for Glass Flooring and Glass Stair Tread applications. Each of these products is designed with our Glass Sandpaper safety finish, an incredibly durable and effective safety finish.

Partitions in Grande Style

Producing Grande features of handmade kiln formed glass is what Nathan Allan Glass does best. Our unique textures are often produced in super thick glass, at times up to 3” thick. The finished glass is always extremely bold and impressive!

Large walls of solid materials are often replaced with our creative designs, such as our custom Sawtooth Glass shown here at Hudson Yards, NYC. Working with KPF of New York City, this custom pattern was created specifically for the Hudson Yards project. It is a one of a kind design, made exclusively for our client.

Nathan Allan produces over 150+ impressive glass designs, along with bold color options. Specify our unique textured glass in your next project to brighten your interior or exterior space, and add richness to your design. Nathan Allan kiln formed glass is ideal for all Glass Wall and Glass Partition applications.

VIEW CASE STUDY
Architectural Cast Glass

Another exclusive Nathan Allan Architectural Glass creation is our Heavy, Thick Glass Counter Tops. Produced in 1.5” to 4” thick glass, these Heavy Thick Glass Countertops are available in over 60 textures. An original design feature is that each Thick Glass Countertop also comes with matching textured glass edges.

We are proud to announce many great designers and clients, whom we have the privilege of working with in the past few months . Most recently we have collaborated with Meyer Davis, Switzer, Marnell Companies, HOK, Joyce Wang, Marriott Design, and ID3 Design. Projects include Louis Vuitton, Tiffany’s, Four Seasons Hotels, Marriott, InMocean, Blackhawk Casino, Mother Mercy Hospitals, and Cache Creek Casino. As we progress through the next few years, many exciting projects are upcoming. Photos and details will be posted on our website as these projects are completed.

READ MORE
Portfolio

Architectural Glass by Nathan Allan Glass Studios is created with the highest production standards. Using many exclusive and creative production techniques, our Architectural Glass offerings are unique and one of a kind. Designs are vibrant and exciting, enhancing every interior design space we create our glass for. Select our stunning textured glass options and set your project apart from the competition…

GET INSPIRED
Discover The Future Of LUXURY

We have an expansive variety of luxury glass products available within our FreeForm and Josiah J Collections. These unique glass products are exclusively created by talented Nathan Allan artists, and are only available at Nathan Allan. If you are looking for a unique and artistic glass product for your high end quality hotel, casino, restaurant, office or home, Nathan Allan has a vast array of designer glass products to choose from.

Give your designer project the look of luxury by selecting one of our Architectural Glass offerings, such as our Crackle Glass, Convex Glass, or Cathedral Glass. When you choose an exclusive Nathan Allan Architectural Glass product, your project stands out from all others, demonstrating your desire for high end quality.

Partner with us, and set your company apart. We are a Glass Manufacturing Company and look forward to working with you!s, and set your company apart.

VIEW OUR PRODUCTS
United Hospital Mother Baby

In this beautiful Healthcare project, one can view the flowing, continuous design of Nathan Allan’s Mirage Architectural glass panels. These stunning panels are produced in a bent, safety tempered glass, another first and only design by Nathan Allan. Our Mirage Architectural glass panels have become a central meeting area within the United Mother Baby Hospital and create an upbeat, energizing feeling for patients and visiting family.

Welcome

Insul-Lite Manufacturing™ is a wholesale sealed unit manufacturer that has serviced the glass industry in Alberta and B.C. since 1988. We supply lites and custom sealed units to window manufacturers, glazing contractors and glass shops.

About Us

With the high demand for 3mm, 4mm, 5mm and 6mm sealed units in Alberta & B.C., Insul-Lite™ has made it possible for customers to receive their orders much quicker than industry standard.

Every unit that leaves Insul-Lite™ has been assembled and inspected to ensure only the highest quality products reach our customers. This includes not only clear and low emissivity (Low E) units, but any tint, pattern glass, or safety glass produced.

The glass industry experiences emergencies on a regular basis and Insul-Lite™ is ready to quickly help solve any problems that arise. We understand the importance of providing timely solutions in these situations, so give us a call if an emergency arises.

In keeping with the need to reduce waste and our impact on the environment, Insul-Lite™ has gone above and beyond by establishing a recycling program. Enlisting companies with the ability to recycle unusable glass waste, packaging, and other materials used in the production of sealed units has drastically reduced the volume sent to city land fills. At Insul-Lite™ we are committed to our community and do our part to limit our environmental impact.

The success that Insul-Lite™ has had within the industry would not have been possible without the amazing support of the Alberta and B.C. communities. We recognize this support and work to give back to the community which has served us so well. The staff at Insul-Lite™ enjoy donating time to various non-profit organizations as a way to give back to the community.

Our Core Focus

 

Our Guiding Principles And Who We Truly Are As People.

Safety
Safety

We have a sacred responsibility to make our business and industry free of injury and danger.

Commitment

We show respect for each other by doing what we say we are going to do.

Hard Work

Our maximum effort honours the contributions of our associates and our customer’s trust in us.

Vision

What we do today affects us, our future, our families, our partners and customers.

People

Our associates, partners and customers are family. We care about their success as well as our own.

SCHEDULE YOUR APPOINTMENT

SERVICES
Collision & Auto Body Repair

From scratches or dents to major damage due to an auto collision, CSN is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and licensed technicians to be your collision repair expert. We will help you navigate the repair process, from dealing with an insurance company, to a professional estimate and final repair.

More Information
Scratch & Dent Repair

At CSN, we know how important it is to have your car in like-new condition. Whether a runaway shopping cart found your door, or a hailstorm used your hood for target practice, we’ll take care of those blemishes no matter how big or small.

More Information
Windshield & Glass Repair

From broken windows, to shattered glass, damaged sideview/rear-view mirrors or windows, we have the tools to get you back in your vehicle safely and quickly. CSN’s licensed and trained glass technicians will repair or replace glass on your vehicle no matter the extent of the damage.

More Information
Vehicle Paint

At CSN, our vehicle paint specialists and high-tech equipment will make sure your vehicle paint is expertly applied and perfectly matched. Trust us to take care of your vehicle and have it restored to its best condition.

More Information
Paintless Dent Repair

Paintless dent repair is often a less expensive alternative to remove minor dents without the need for a full paint job. Bring your vehicle to a CSN collision facility for a free estimate or schedule an appointment today!

More Information
24-Hour Towing

Accidents happen. You can trust our 24-Hour towing services to transport your car to the CSN Collision location of your choice. Call 1-877-700-4276 for towing assistance. No matter what happens, trust CSN. We’ll straighten it out.

More Information

With over 200 locations and more OEM certifications than any other network, CSN Collision is proud to be Canada’s choice for quality collision repair.

WHY CHOOSE CSN

CSN was founded in 2002 with the goal in mind to provide high-quality repairs and outstanding customer service. CSN takes pride in having one of the most OEMs certifications in Canada and offers repairs using state-of-the-art equipment. You will also benefit from a national lifetime warranty.

Our Car Repair Shops Hold a Reputation for Quality

At CSN Collision, the customer is our priority. CSN is committed to delivering safety, reliability, and trust to our customers. Our repair shops are equipped with state-of-the-art technology and advanced techniques to provide the best possible repair experience. You can expect excellent customer service across the network – guaranteed.

Choosing a collision centre

Free On-site and Contact-Free estimates

If you are involved in a collision, be assured that your vehicle is in good hands with CSN. We can help you navigate the entire repair process with FREE on-site and contact-free collision estimates. Trust CSN to provide you with the transparency and care that you deserve to get back in your vehicle with confidence.

Enquire now

National Lifetime Warranty

Not all collision repair warranties are made equal. At CSN, it is our guarantee that you will feel safe and comfortable getting back on the road knowing that CSN employs advanced techniques and fully trained professionals to repair your car. Every CSN repair facility offers a National Lifetime Warranty on all repairs performed, for as long as you own your vehicle.

Learn more

Industry Leading Qualifications

CSN has over 700 certifications OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) certifications, the most of any collision repair network in Canada. If a shop is OEM certified for a particular vehicle, it means that their staff have been trained to provide high-quality repairs to that vehicle and that the equipment used has been approved by the original car manufacturer.

ABOUT

Mastertech has been creating and building custom door systems for the construction and home improvement markets for over 25 years. In 1987, Mastertech was created to fill a void in the market, there was a lack of door manufactures that could consistently build custom door systems with exceptional quality. Our drive for unequalled quality and innovation remains the cornerstone of our process. Today Mastertech is recognized as a leader in the custom door manufacturing industry.

 Travel Offers 
What is it that stays with you?
Watch 'The Reason'
There’s no shortage of things to see and do while you’re here. And we’re happy to help you plan. But our best advice for travellers? Take the scenic route when you can. Take someone up on an invitation. Or just take it all in. Ask anyone who’s been here and they’re likely to tell you the best part of their trip was something they could never have planned.
Up your winter game.
Experience Skiing, Snowmobiling & More
Get up close and personable with the Welcome Desk.
Learn about icebergs, puffins, and whales
Every place has a story. This one's ours.

Discover Come From Away
Our Destinations

There are places on this earth that continue to live inside of you long after you’ve travelled on. Places where you’ll find yourself among the friendliest of unfamiliar faces, some of whom may become lifelong friends. Why not start your visit in one of our most popular places?

Explore All Destinations
Gros Morne National Park
 
St. John's
 
Terra Nova National Park
 
Torngat Mountains National Park
 
L'Anse aux Meadows National Historic Site
 
Fogo & Change Islands
Flights Car & Ferry
Who knew that arriving here could be such a departure?
Travelling here by plane is a popular option, and airlines fly into St. John’s, Gander, Deer Lake, Happy Valley-Goose Bay, and Wabush. Flying times for direct flights to St. John's are about 3.5 hours from Toronto, 6 hours from Edmonton / Calgary, and 5 hours from London. Other international routes are available into the region via Halifax. Regional airlines service smaller destinations and operate flights within the province.

Travellers are encouraged to check with individual airlines and ferry services for the most up-to-date information prior to and during travel.

More Flight Information

 Planning on driving to the island? Most travellers will take the ferry from Nova Scotia to either Port aux Basques or Argentia, and there are ferry routes for travelling between the island and Labrador. You can also drive to Labrador from the mainland of Canada, via Québec.


More Car & Ferry Information

Things To Do

There’s enough coastline wrapped around this place to stretch across Canada four times over. So whether you take a hike along ancient footpaths, pack a picnic and watch for whales, or head out to sea to hunt for icebergs, you’ll find it all comes standard with a great ocean view.

GT Glass was established in 2008 by Greg & Trish Holst as a small business out of our garage with just one employee. Our business has evolved into a 4000 square foot shop/showroom in Saskatoon’s north end with eight employees.

Greg has been in the construction industry for over thirty years. His attention to detail, vision, and sense of style show in the quality of the finished product. Trish has many years of business experience and keeps the office running with her warm and friendly attitude.

GT Glass has now been in business for over 10 years. We still pride ourselves on exceptional customer service and strive to give all our customers the benefit of our years of experience in the construction industry.

From Saskatoon and area home builders to contractors to ‘do-it-yourselfers’, all of our customers receive the same personal attention from the first phone call to the completion of the installation.

Quality Products

We work with quality suppliers to provide you with the highest standard products. If we wouldn’t install it in our house, we won’t install it in yours!

Expert Installation

With a team of 4 experienced installers, your project is completed to exacting standards, and on time!

Customer Service

We promise quick replies to your phone calls and emails, and timely warranty response.

Hydrophobic Coating

Protect your investment (and save yourself time!) with the latest in protective coatings that help cut down on water marks and scaling.

Custom Design

With our years of expertise, we can help you find the perfect solution and unique design for your project.

Other Products

Contact us for any custom glass project – including wine rooms, gym doors, glass railings, partition walls and more!

SHOWER DOORS

Custom, Framed, or Frameless Shower Doors – We do them all! With our large inventory selection, we can get most standard sized shower doors manufactured and installed within a week. 

LEARN MORE
MIRRORS

We custom cut your mirror and finish with a machined edge for that polished look. Full wall mirrors are a great option for dance studios and gyms. Bevelled mirrors are also available in standard and custom sizes and shapes.

LEARN MORE
CUSTOM GLASS

We provide railing glass, backsplashes, doors and walls for your office, wine rooms, gym doors, and more! We also offer a selection of standard glass shelves, or we can custom make to suit your project.

LEARN MORE
OUR PROCESS
Get A Quote

We like to start with a quick discussion (either over the phone or in our showroom) to determine the type of product you are looking for.  That way we can give you a general quote to assist you in budgeting.

Meet With Us

An on-site measure/consultation is the next step.  We set up an appointment and have one of our experts meet with you.  That way we can get precise measurements, offer possible suggestions and troubleshoot any potential issues.

Place The Order

Once we have the measurements, placing your order is as simple as confirming the quote and providing us with the required deposit.

Fast Installation

Installation usually takes place within 3 to 4 weeks of placing the order (for custom orders) or within 1 week for items we have in stock.

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY
My husband and I recently worked with GT Glass on a bathroom renovation. It was such a pleasure working with this company. Their professionalism and expertise is second to none. From our very first meeting with Greg to the final installation by Austin, we couldn't have asked for better service. To top it all off, our shower doors look fantastic! We highly recommend Greg and Trish and their company, GT Glass for your shower door needs, whether it's a renovation or a newly constructed bathroom. Thanks GT Glass. You will definitely be a part of our next bathroom renovation.
- Cindy & Brad
Soroski Homes Ltd. has had the pleasure of working with GT Glass on several projects over the last number of years. GT Glass has proven to be very professional, responsible and reliable in their dealings with us. We have also recommended their services to friends and have always received very positive feedback in regards to their work. It is without reservation that we highly recommend them for any shower door, glass or mirror needs that you may have.
- Jim at Soroski Homes Ltd.
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Find information to the most commonly asked questions regarding your new shower door or custom glass. For additional information, or for assistance regarding your specific product, please contact us directly by phone, email or the contact form below and our glass experts will respond to you as soon as possible.
GLASS CARE

GT Glass suggests the following for proper cleaning and care of your shower door enclosure. Squeegeeing the glass frequently, then drying with a soft cloth is highly recommended. Using a squeegee after each shower helps keep spots and scale from accumulating on glass components. We also follow the recommendation of the Bath Enclosure Manufacturing Association (BEMA). You should avoid abrasives, bleach, acidic or vinegar-based cleaners and scrubbing pads. Read labels on cleaning products thoroughly before using. If your glass is coated or treated with surface protectants, see the PDF below for instructions.

Offrez-vous des pièces de verre originales et signées!

10 janvier 2011 par La Mailloche

Pour vos cadeaux corporatifs ou pour faire plaisir à des proches, ou simplement pour enrichir votre collection, soyez inventifs et contribuez à une bonne cause!

Offrez des pièces de verre originales et signées de la production La Mailloche!

L’écomusée La Mailloche a fermé ses portes en 2009 suite à la mort de son président fondateur Jean Vallières. Le Musée des maîtres et artisans du Québec est détenteur des pièces restantes du maître disparu.

En achetant les pièces de la collection de verre La Mailloche, vous aurez la chance de détenir des objets de collection que vous ne trouverez nulle part ailleurs!

Tous les profits seront réinvestis dans notre projet de construction d’une nouvelle réserve normée pour assurer la pérennité de nos collections d’objets faits mains au Québec. Faites votre choix en remplissant le bon de commande accompagné de votre règlement de paiement. Nous vous enverrons votre commande par la poste ou vous pouvez venir au Musée récupérer votre commande et en profiter pour visiter les lieux. Autant joindre l’utile à l’agréable en faisant connaissance avec un beau musée et économiser les frais d’envoi postal!

Vous pouvez venir au Musée récupérer votre commande et en profiter pour visiter les lieux. Autant joindre l’utile à l’agréable en faisant connaissance avec un beau musée et économiser les frais d’envoi postal!

Au-delà d’une commande supérieure à 500 $, le Musée des maîtres et artisans se chargera de la livraison chez vous, dans la région de Montréal uniquement.

Pour commander
Cliquez sur le lien suivant pour voir et choisir votre sélection: http://www.flickr.com/photos/museemaq

Après avoir choisi les pièces, téléchargez le bon de commande (format Word) sur ce lien http://www.mmaq.qc.ca/verremailloche.htm et remplissez les champs appropriés. Sauvegardez et envoyez le document par courriel à m.dube@mmaq.qc.ca ou par la poste au 615, avenue Sainte-Croix, Saint-Laurent (Québec) H4L 3X6 (à l’attention de Manon Dubé).

Pour plus d’informations: Nacer Izza (514) 747-7367, poste 7384 ou communication@mmaq.qc.ca

© Musée des maîtres et artisans du Québec, 2011

Le Musée des maîtres et artisans du Québec (MMAQ)

10 janvier 2011 par La Mailloche

 Le Musée des maîtres et artisans du Québec
a pour mission de mettre en valeur le patrimoine culturel québécois à travers les arts et les traditions artisanales d’hier à aujourd’hui. L’objectif du musée est de diffuser et de faire connaître les arts anciens et les traditions artisanales, les métiers d’art et l’art contemporain auprès des collectivités locales, régionales et nationales.

 L’exposition permanente Mains de maîtres
L’exposition permanente présente les plus belles pièces de l’importante collection du musée composée d’une part de la collection de l’École du meuble amassée par Jean-Marie Gauvreau, de celle de Gérard Lavallée, fondateur et premier conservateur du musée, et des pièces et collections plus contemporaines acquises par ses successeurs. La collection du musée est composée d’objets faits à la main par les maîtres et artisans anciens et par les artistes et artisans des métiers d’art modernes et contemporains. L’audio guide bilingue de l’exposition permanente Mains de maîtres, a été créé par le conteur Fred Pellerin qui a su mettre en évidence l’âme de ces objets avec ses mots et à sa poésie.

Un musée situé dans un écrin
Inauguré en 1978, le musée est situé dans une église néogothique du 19e siècle reconnue pour la beauté de son architecture. Ce cadre exceptionnel ajoute une dimension symbolique à la visite du musée et transforme cette dernière en expérience unique.

 Plusieurs nouveautés
Le musée propose de nombreuses expositions temporaires, des activités culturelles et des programmes éducatifs chaque année.

 Des collections importantes
Les collections du Musée des maîtres et artisans du Québec totalisent plus de 10000 objets reliés aux arts, aux métiers d’art et aux traditions artisanales anciennes et contemporaines. Les fiches des objets de ces collections sont disponibles sur le site web d’Artefacts Canada

 Un musée engagé socialement
Installé dans l’arrondissement Saint-Laurent à Montréal où vivent et se côtoient plus de 160 communautés différentes et dont plus de 51 % de la population n’est pas née au Canada, le musée travaille depuis cinq ans à développer et à tisser des liens étroits avec celles-ci.

 Pour découvrir le musée
Le musée est situé au 615, avenue Sainte-Croix, arrondissement de Saint-Laurent. – Accès par le métro, sortie Du Collège. Ouvert du mercredi au dimanche, de 12 h à 17 h.
Renseignements : www.mmaq.qc.ca  ou 514 747-7367

Directeur-conservateur : Pierre Wilson

Take Your Shower to the Next Level And Keep it in Pristine Condition For the Coming Years
STARPHIRE SUPER CLEAR LOW IRON GLASS

Most glass, while clear, has a green or blue tint to it. The tint and clarity of a pane of glass are greatly affected by the sand used to create it, specifically, where the sand was cultivated and how much iron and phosphorus the sand contains. Starphire Super Clear Low Iron Glass is a high-quality glass product known for its superior clarity and transparency and is almost colourless thanks to its specialized manufacturing process, which removes the majority of iron from glass. Starphire Super Clear Low Iron Glass offers maximum visibility, allowing the true colours, aesthetics, and design of any interior space to be displayed to their full capacity.

INVISIBLE SHIELD 15-YEAR GLASS PROTECTION

Any glass surface has an imperfect surface that can attract a build-up of products, soap, dust, and other particles. The Invisible Shield 15-Year Glass Protection is a specially formulated protective coating that creates a strong, durable barrier that helps prevent chips, scratches, and other common forms of glass damage. Invisible Shield 15-Year Glass Protection is applied through a specialized process, resulting in a protective nano-scale coating that seals the surface of the glass without any visible seams. The system ensures that particles cannot bond to the glass, making it easier to clean and maintain without the need for any special or harsh cleaning solutions.

FLEURCO SEKUR SHATTERPROOF PROTECTIVE FILM

Glass, when broken, can pose a serious danger. Fleurco Sekur Shatterproof Protective Film is designed to prevent the glass from shattering on impact. A film made from a high-quality, strong polyester material is applied to the surface of the glass and will hold the glass together when broken. While the glass will break, it will not shatter and potentially cause damage or injury. In addition to added safety, Fleurco Sekur Shatterproof Protective Film helps ensure the durability and overall performance of glass with improved resistance to scratches, chips, and other damage.

ADVANTAGES OF SMARTGLASS
Remote Privacy

Smartglass can be operated with the touch of a button from your remote control, even dimmer, wall switch and also from your smartphone.

Blocks UV rays

Smartglass blocks 98% of harmful UV rays. Suntan and sunburn are familiar effects of over-exposure of the skin to UV, along with higher risk of skin cancer.

Blocks Infrared Radiation

Smartglass blocks 95% of harmful Infrared radiation since sunlight damages human skin, resulting in a wrinkled appearance, so protect yourself from the harmful rays. IR and heat exposure each induces inflammatory cellular infiltration, thereby adding to premature skin aging.

Energy Efficient

Smartglass blocks the indoor temperature from escaping resulting in cutting your energy cost by 12%

Easy Maintenance

Smartglass is easy to maintain and clean unlike drapes or blinds by simply using ISO propyl alcohol.

Dust/allergy Problems

Unlike curtains/drapes that does accumulate dust, germs or even bacteria, Smartglass is a lot cleaner and germ free.

Additional Security

Whiteboard

Projection Screen

We specializes in upcycling discarded glass into exquisite functional art inspired by Canada’s northern wildlife and natural beauty.

Why Choose Us?
Our history, our team, and our doors set us apart from the rest.
1
Our President

For over 40 years, the name Frank Nicolazzo has become synonymous with patio doors. Over the years, he has adapted to many changes in the industry, giving him invaluable knowledge, technical expertise, design aptitude and a commitment to quality manufacturing. 


2
Our Team

Our operations team is comprised of some of the most skilled and experienced craftspeople in the industry. They are committed to remarkable craftsmanship while designing and manufactering each patio door.

Our front office staff are administrative professionals who are committed to offering outstanding customer service. Feel free to reach out to us for any questions about our products, or for help with fulfilling your company's order.

3
Our Doors

Our doors are best in class. Whether you're a homeowner or an installer, you can rest assured that the Pacific Series 1000 delivers industry-leading quality, with a wide array of options.


That's not all.
Oceanview Patio Doors strives to be an industry leader in efficiency and community participation.
•

All of our doors exceed the industry’s highest standards for quality, durability, and energy savings. Our superior insulation eliminates water and air infiltration between frame and panels. Cardinal Endur IG insulating glass allows for outstanding thermal performance and solar control.

Oceanview Patio Doors is a proud ENERGY STAR Canada participant, and an active member of Fenestration Canada. That means we have a seat at the table, and an opportunity to influence standards and to advocate for consistent and achievable regulation.

Les Produits Verglass
Verglass développe et fabrique deux grandes familles de produits, le Miraglass et le Miragrit, respectivement des poudres et des granulats de verre destinés à améliorer les performances physiques et chimiques d’une variété de formulations et produits.

La ligne de produits Miraglass regroupe l’ensemble des poudres ultrafines fabriquées par Verglass à partir de verre recyclé. Les poudres micronisées Miraglass sont des produits à haute valeur ajoutée pour différents secteurs d’industries majeures qui procurent plusieurs avantages lors de leur insertion dans les mélanges servant à la fabrication de divers produits. Miraglass est divisé en trois familles, soit le Miracem pour les ciments coulis et mortiers, le Miraplast pour les plastiques et caoutchoucs, puis le Mirapaint pour les peintures, vernis, adhésifs et autres mélanges de revêtements.

Les produits Miraplast sont des additifs destinés aux formulations de plastiques et de caoutchoucs et offrant notamment une meilleure stabilité dimensionnelle aux produits.

En savoir plus

Les produits Miracem sont des additifs destinés aux ciments, coulis et mortiers afin d’offrir de meilleures performances chimiques et physiques.

En savoir plus

Les produits Mirapaint sont des additifs destinés aux formulations de peintures, vernis, adhésifs et autres revêtements liquides ou mélanges 100 % solides.

About FDM Manufacturing Ltd

FDM Manufacturing Ltd has been the leader in the manufacturing of Custom Fireplace Doors for over 40 years. Offering lead times inside of 4 weeks all year round, we provide quality custom fireplace glass doors, wire mesh doors and free standing screens with your time in mind!

FDM MFG LTD located in the lower mainland of British Columbia, Canada where we do all of our custom, hand crafted and computer generated designs in house, which allows us to keep turn around times low and quality control high.
We offer hand-crafted quality, convenience of quick turn around times, excellent selection of styles, options and finishes to suit all decors.

ENERGY LOSS: 20% of energy loss is due to poorly fitted fireplace flue dampers, our fireplace doors will virtually eliminate unnecessary heat loss in the winter, and keep heat out in the summer.

SAFETY: With our tight fitting doors, you do not have to wait until the fire is completely out, simply close the doors on the dying fire and keep any would be sparks where they belong

Please note: we always recommend burning with the doors open!

*Due to environmental regulations, we are no longer operating in house plated finishes.
We apologize for the inconvenience and will be updating our website to reflect the many powder coat finishes we have to offer!

Since the beginning G2 Creations has created a variety of giftware products, including, candle holders, picture frames, and ornaments, but has also expanded into souvenirs, corporate incentive gifts as well as trophies and awards.

The diversity of experiences and interests of its individual members fosters a creative and experimental environment. Glen Williams Glass is open daily, and welcomes visitors to observe the glassblowing process and enquire about the various techniques and styles of its eight members.

The studio was founded in 1995 by Andrew Kuntz, Glass faculty member at Sheridan College, and Carol Nesbitt, Camilla Willings, Michelle Miller, Megan Kenny and Jennifer Tarrant; graduates of the program. The studio continues to maintain strong ties to the college. Many of the current members are graduates of Sheridan’s Craft and Design program, and have also sought additional education through courses and workshops at the Studio at Corning Museum of Glass, Pilchuck Glass School, and at Fleming College’s Haliburton School of the Arts. Works made by the artists are exhibited and collected both locally and internationally in public venues and private collections.

In addition to its function as a co-operative, Glen Williams Glass regularly welcomes non-members to the studio. Qualified glassblowers are able to rent the facilities, and each year the studio members award a Summer Scholarship Program to a Sheridan College student.

Welcome to Vinylco Windows

We Make Your Space Looking Fresh & Modern

Welcome to Vinylco Windows Ltd. We manufacture quality vinyl windows, custom sizes and industry standard sizes as well. No matter what your application we can make it for you. Our vinyl windows are available with the nail-on fin or a rebate fin for renovation. We can also make many other custom types of windows including arch top, round tops, rake windows as well as custom glass options are available such as sandblasted pictures and custom muntin bars available in a variety of colors to meet your needs. Vinylco has been manufacturing vinyl windows since 2000, weather you are building your custom dream house or a multi family project or renovating a house Vinylco can help you. We believe that quality and beauty should be priced affordably.

Mission Statement

Vinylco Windows Ltd. Is dedicated to making high quality products at an affordable price for all customers, never to compromise quality and exceed customer’s expectations in service, by constant improvement and innovation. We will work hard to ensure our customers are satisfied, with quality and price, and to be outdone by only ourselves.

Sandfire Scientific Ltd.
Leaders in Scientific Glassblowing, Scientific Glass and Lab Glass

Sandfire Scientific manufactures and repairs Quartz and Borosilicate Glass Apparatus and Glass Systems. From basic laboratory glassware to acetic stills, Sandfire can repair or manufacture your glassware. Be they one-of-a kind items, small to large production runs, or R&D.

For 50 years, Sandfire Scientific Ltd has been supplying quality custom-made and production lab glass to private companies, learning and research institutions, as well as government agencies, working in a variety of fields, such as minerals, energy, life sciences and everything in between. We are also specialist in carbon coating, vacuum shrinking, machining and encapsulation of glass.

We are a Canadian company with a client base that spans the globe. From Gothenburg, Sweden to Lima, Peru, and from South Korea to Turkey. We offer prompt service and guarantee our work. We invite you to contact us for all your scientific glass needs by using the email link in the side bar or the quick contact form below. If you wish to include a drawing or photo with your message, please go to our contact page. Thank you.

Advanced Magnetometers & Gradiometers

GEM Advanced Magnetometers is a supplier of magnetometers, gradiometers and magnetic sensors for Earth Science, Geophysics and other applications. With more than three decades in the research and development of equipment for geophysical exploration, GEM is also known for its service and support – featuring knowledgeable magnetics professionals and the industry-leading three-year warranty program.

Advanced Quantum Magnetometer Technologies

Quantum magnetometers take advantage of the spin of subatomic particles (nuclei and unpaired valence electrons). Through a process of polarization, particles are caused to precess in the earth's ambient magnetic field. The resulting frequency of precession can be translated directly into magnetic field units. Quantum results are scalar (total field intensity) as opposed to vector (i.e. from fluxgate geophysical instruments or GEM's Suspended dIdD technology).

GEM leads in developing advanced quantum magnetometer technologies, including the Overhauser, optically pumped Potassium (K-Mag) and Proton Precession magnetometers. The company is recognized as the successful commercial developer of both the Overhauser and Potassium magnetometer / gradiometer. Moreover, its Proton Precession magnetometer / gradiometer is the latest technology system in its class.
Helping Professionals Meet their Application Needs

Quantum magnetometers and gradiometers are widely applied due to their ease-of-use, low cost of surveying, and data quality. Applications include Airborne Mapping, Archaeology, Earthquake Prediction, Education and Research, Environmental and Engineering, Mineral and Oil Exploration, Observatories, Unexploded Ordnance Detection (UXO), Volcanology and others.

Shoham Machinery Ltd.

 

Shoham Machinery Ltd. is a leading designer and manufacturer of tooling and machinery for the Aluminum and PVC industries. For over 30 years Shoham's products have been providing perfect punching solutions for complicated cutting and perforating requirements. 




Shoham's Manual and Pneumatic punching tools can be adapted for diverse applications. The majority of our products are designed to be utilized by aluminum and vinyl fabricators handling windows, doors, storefront and curtain wall systems. Aluminum and PVC profiles are our primary field of expertise; however, we are equally familiar with other types of metals and materials.

About Primary Seal
Get professional advice and quality installation of your vinyl windows and exterior doors from a top supplier in the business.

We take great pride in supplying highly rated vinyl windows to homeowners, contractors and architects.

We believe that replacing your windows should only be done once. This can only be achieved by starting with a product designed, tested and built to perform and last a lifetime.

Our team of consultants, installers and after-service crews take great pride in making, supplying and maintaining our products.

Get a FREE Quote
Our Windows

Our ENERGY STAR™ qualified windows collection offer a fresh and contemporary look to meet the most demanding design requirements. The clean style is achieved through smooth lines, beveled exteriors and attractive hardware. Our line of premium replacement windows are fusion-welded with our proprietary patented Quad-Seal System for strength and operating performance. Choose from a wide variety of glass, color and grid options to create the perfect window for your architectural needs.

Casement Windows

Provide you with an unobstructed view from top-to-bottom and side-to-side and open to 93º degrees for easy cleaning and directing the flow of fresh air into your home.

Awning Windows

Open outward from the bottom allowing air from outside to circulate within your home. Our Awning Windows provide a beautiful, unobstructed view, while providing a unique protective shield from the elements.

Single Sliding Windows

Single slider windows consist of one sash that slides horizontally and one that is stationary. The operative sash tilts inward to allow for safe and easy cleaning from the inside. It creates ventilation without cluttering up the face of your home.

Double Sliding Windows

Enjoy the ease of opening our double-slider windows without taking up any exterior space. Also, our tilt feature allows you to clean your windows effortlessly from the inside of your home.

Single Hung Windows

Single hung windows consist of one sash which slides vertically from the bottom and one stationary sash at the top. The operative sash tilts inward to allow for safe and easy cleaning from inside your home. Single Hung windows are an elegant addition to compliment your home.

Double Hung Windows

Double hung windows consist of two sashes that move vertically. Both sashes tilt inward to allow for safe and easy cleaning from inside your home. Double Hung windows provide you with a simple yet intriguing look that will complement both your home’s interior and exterior.

Exterior Entrance & Patio Doors
Primary Seal offer a fresh new and contemporary look to meet the most demanding design requirements. The clean style is achieved through smooth lines, beveled exteriors and attractive hardware. Our line of premium replacement doors feature industry leading hardward and are built using the highest grade materials.

Get professional advice and quality installation of your exterior doors from a top manufacturer in the business. From concept to completion, Primary Seal guarantees satisfaction at a reasonable cost. Our company has a solid reputation for quality and craftsmanship. We provide retail contractors, homeowners, wholesalers and custom builders with a vast selection of replacement door systems.

Steel Doors

Our steel entrance doors provide your home with an exceptionally appealing look. Whether you are looking for a traditional or contemporary style, you can be sure to find the perfect match with over 500 glass insert options to choose from. Our inserts are available in a wide variety of colours, finishes and grill patterns including stained glass and wrought iron.

Fibreglass Doors

Our fibreglass entrance doors are made of a high impact, compression molded, fibreglass; in addition to being corrosion free, it also resists warping, splitting, bowing and cracking. They feature a superior oak grain finish that provides the warm texture and authentic feel of real wood without all the disadvantages such as natural deterioration.

Sliding Vinyl Patio Doors

Our 7000 and 6000 vinyl Thermo sliding doors combine up to date technology, superiority, decorative features, heavy-duty performance and uncompromising durability. Our vinyl sliding doors will give you years of maintenance free performance that are perfect for new home construction or renovation projects.

Edgehog Advanced Technologies

LESS reflection.

​
Introducing OMNI-DIRECTIONAL anti-reflection technology

​

          broadband anti-reflection technology
​
          works at all angles 
​
          reduces reflection to 0.5% for all colours of light
 
For cameras, this means a better wide-angle image, and no glare and flare when taking the photo near a light source like the sun. The ghost image of the light source is often an unwanted artifact that reduces reliability for image recognition applications.  
 
For solar panels, Edgehog’s eluminar™ cover glass boosts solar panel energy output by up to 12% annually. Game-changing 25% gains are realized during the critical morning and evening shoulder periods.

Welcome to Jaxville Gold & Silver Trading Ltd. We are a locally owned and operated LLC serving Red Deer and Central Alberta since 2004. Gold and silver is our business and not a sideline. We buy almost anything made of, or containing, measurable quantities of gold and/or silver. Jaxville sells gold and silver only in pure form (99.5% or better) such as bullion bars and coins. We take great pride in offering courteous and knowledgeable service, as well as doing our best to meet our customers' needs. Whether you are considering selling some old unwanted jewellery or securing some gold or silver bullion, please call us today.

HISTORY

Jaxville was established in 2004 as an actual bullion exchange open to the public.  The shop was opened with the goal of placing as much specie (gold and silver bars and coins) as possible into the stronger hands of the community.  This is being accomplished by being a local market maker for gold maple leaf coins specifically, as well as a wide range of other gold and silver bullion products pending availability.  We are buying all forms of gold and silver.

Learn More
	
WHAT WE DO

Jaxville also recycles scrap gold, usually in the form of jewellery, through refining and processing. Recycled gold is offered to local goldsmiths and fabricators at spot prices. Turn your broken or unwanted jewellery into cash. We are paying 75% of spot gold value on all karat jewellery.

Learn More
	
JAXVILLE VIDEOS

Jack Fortin, President of Jaxville, speaks of the importance of holding precious metals and answers a few of Jaxville's most frequently asked questions.

Testing 123..

This page is used to test the proper operation of the Apache HTTP server after it has been installed. If you can read this page it means that this site is working properly. This server is powered by CentOS.

Just visiting?

The website you just visited is either experiencing problems or is undergoing routine maintenance.

If you would like to let the administrators of this website know that you've seen this page instead of the page you expected, you should send them e-mail. In general, mail sent to the name "webmaster" and directed to the website's domain should reach the appropriate person.

For example, if you experienced problems while visiting www.example.com, you should send e-mail to "webmaster@example.com".

Are you the Administrator?

You should add your website content to the directory /var/www/html/.

To prevent this page from ever being used, follow the instructions in the file /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf.

Promoting Apache and CentOS

You are free to use the images below on Apache and CentOS Linux powered HTTP servers. Thanks for using Apache and CentOS!

 

Important note:

The CentOS Project has nothing to do with this website or its content, it just provides the software that makes the website run.

If you have issues with the content of this site, contact the owner of the domain, not the CentOS project. Unless you intended to visit CentOS.org, the CentOS Project does not have anything to do with this website, the content or the lack of it.

For example, if this website is www.example.com, you would find the owner of the example.com domain at the following WHOIS server:

http://www.internic.net/whois.html

The CentOS Project

The CentOS Linux distribution is a stable, predictable, manageable and reproduceable platform derived from the sources of Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL).

Additionally to being a popular choice for web hosting, CentOS also provides a rich platform for open source communities to build upon. For more information please visit the CentOS website.

Économusée
NOUS JOINDRE
ATELIER DE VERRE SOUFFLÉ & TAILLE DE PIERRES FINES

Touverre, c’est la passion de transformer la matière. Notre atelier de verre soufflé et de taille de pierres fines est au cœur d’un économusée qui vous donne la chance de vous immerser dans l’univers de l’artiste du verre.

Toujours en quête de nouvelles formes et couleurs, le sculpteur de verre conçoit une grande variété de sculptures et figurines en verre issues de différentes techniques de manipulation, de coloration et de cuisson. Son art s’étend de la conception et réalisation d'œuvres intégrées à l’architecture jusqu’aux trophées sur mesure, en passant par les sculptures en série limitée et les bijoux, comme les colliers, les boucles d’oreilles et les bagues.

En savoir plus
VERRE SOUFFLÉ ARTISANAL & PIERRES FINES

Touverre vous propose des pièces en verre soufflé et des sculptures de verre uniques et colorées, en plus de vous offrir une gamme de bijoux élaborés à partir de pierres fines. Nos créations sont l'œuvre de Giuseppe Benedetto, artiste du verre depuis près de 50 ans.

Voir tous les produits
VERRE SOUFFLÉ
Voir tous les produits
SCULPTURE ET PEINTURE
Voir tous les produits
PIERRES FINES
VISITEZ L’ÉCONOMUSÉE DU SOUFFLAGE DE VERRE ET DE LA TAILLE DE PIERRES FINES

Vivez une expérience mémorable en visitant l’Économusée Touverre. Plongez dans l’univers du verre soufflé et de la pierre fine en assistant à une démonstration en direct de notre atelier.

Apprenez les secrets du métier de souffleur de verre en observant l’artiste à l’oeuvre ou en participant vous-même à un atelier de soufflage de verre.

Découvrez l’art lapidaire en prenant part à une activité de polissage de pierre fine. Créez votre propre bijou ou offrez-le en cadeau!

Assister à une démonstration de soufflage de verre
Participer à un atelier de verre soufflé
Fabriquer un bijou
Je réserve un atelier
NOS SERVICES

Touverre offre un service de taille et polissage de pierres fines, ainsi qu’un service de mise en forme du métal, pour vous-même ou votre organisation professionnelle.

Taille et polissage de pierres fines

Vous n’avez pas les outils ou les connaissances pour tailler, polir ou mettre en forme vos pierres fines ou métaux? Touverre est prêt à s’en charger pour vous.

Création personnalisée

Chaque création signée Touverre est unique. Vous aimeriez participer à la fabrication d’une pièce originale? Participez à nos ateliers découvertes : créez votre propre pièce en verre soufflé ou polissez vous-même la pierre fine au centre de votre bijou!

Corporatif

Votre organisation prépare un événement corporatif? Touverre peut produire des trophées et médailles pour l’occasion.

Contactez-nous
Services d’encadrement et matériel d’artiste

Desservant le Québec, l’Ontario et le Nouveau-Brunswick, Encadrement Claude vous offre des services professionnels d’encadrement, ainsi que de gravure sur plaques et trophées afin d’immortaliser vos souvenirs les plus chers. Que vous souhaitiez célébrer un anniversaire ou honorer tout autre accomplissement, nous avons la solution qu’il vous faut! Nous vous proposons également une vaste gamme de matériel d’artiste pour vous aider à donner vie à votre imagination.

Notre histoire 
À votre service depuis déjà plus de 35 ans!

En 1980, M. Jean-Pierre Dion et sa fille, Lucie, ont envie de faire de la peinture sur toile et s'inscrivent à des cours chez Mme Ena Auguste. M. Dion décide alors d'ouvrir un petit commerce de matériel d'artiste situé au 2070, boulevard Masson, Les Saules. Ses premiers clients furent, bien sûr, les élèves de Mme Auguste.

​

Quelque temps plus tard, Lucie rencontre Claude Soucy qui devient, par la suite, son conjoint. C'est alors que M. Dion donne l'opportunité à Claude d'ouvrir son propre commerce de fabrication de toiles sur cadre en bois et de chevalets en bois.

En 1983, Claude décide enfin d'ouvrir son commerce, qu'il nomme Menuiserie Claude Enr. Il y fabrique du matériel d'artiste qu'il vend ensuite à M. Dion pour son commerce de vente au détail. La demande étant grandissante, il est forcé de déménager dans des locaux plus grands. Il choisit le 1320, boulevard Masson, où le chiffre d'affaires fera un bond significatif.

 

En 1986, l'achalandage augmentant toujours, il est encore une fois forcé à un déménagement. Il s'installe donc au 4031, rue de Musset à l'arrière de l'ancienne Banque Nationale du boulevard Masson. M. Dion décide alors de vendre son commerce de matériel d'artiste et Claude Soucy s'en porte acquéreur. Lucie et Julie travaillent ainsi avec Claude pour couvrir les heures d'ouverture du commerce.


Lucie quitte alors le travail pour donner naissance à leur premier enfant, Jean-Sébastien. Pour remplacer Lucie, qui part alors en congé de maternité, Claude engage Lucie Charpentier, alors étudiante universitaire, pour travailler les fins de semaine.


En 1994, Menuiserie Claude devient Encadrement Claude Enr afin de mieux s'adapter à la vocation du commerce. Aujourd’hui, en 2024, nous comptons plus de 30 000 clients inscrits chez nous.

Préservez vos souvenirs les plus chers!

Vous pouvez préserver vos images grâce à nos services de numérisation de photos. Afin de protéger vos photos, nous vous proposons également des services de lamination. De plus, avec notre service de transfert sur toile, vous pouvez facilement faire de vos créations artistiques de vraies chef-œuvres!

Découvrez nos nouveautés

Encadrement Claude vous propose désormais desservices d’encadrement personnalisés pour vous aider à encadrer et préserver vos objets précieux, votre manteau d’équipe sportive, des médailles de guerre et même votre robe de mariée!

Over 15 Years Specializing in LED for Residential & Contractors

LED Lights Canada is a Canadian-based provider of quality LED lighting products and services. Based out of Edmonton, Alberta, the company has supported contractor, residential and wholesale markets in Canada. They possess a high degree of product knowledge and carry a wider-variety of LED products than typical retail outlets. Because of their direct work with professionals, they carry a large stock at the showroom location. You will always get the best advice and service from LED Lights Canada.

SLEEP BETTER,
FEEL BETTER,
PERFORM BETTER.

Our bodies, minds and emotions respond to light based on the brightness, colour temperature, and wavelength. Different combinations cause our body to suppress or release melatonin and many other chemicals and hormones, telling us when to sleep and recover, and when to wake and perform.

SLEEP CYCLE

PHASE 2: PERFORM

Phase 3: WIND DOWN

and prepare for sleep.
Phase 4: RESTORE
While you sleep, your body restores
its energy until it is woken up by the morning sun.

When our body follows its natural cycle, it leads
to consistently better sleep quality, which helps:

Reduced Fatigue

Boost Performance

Improve Happiness

Sunlight’s purpose is to support our physiology. Artificial light is designed to illuminate, rather than sync our bodies to a natural circadian rhythm, and the quality of this light is as central to our wellbeing as the quality of our food and water.
HOW LIGHT WORKS
A HEALTHY BUILDING STARTS WITH GOOD LIGHT.

Your building’s systems work in tandem to create healthy, safe, and vibrant indoor environments. Whether your goal is to provide health care, a productive workplace, or a place to exercise your mind or body, your lighting is essential.

 

The Nano-Lit Smart Diffuser™ is the first dynamic lighting product developed in collaboration with chronobiologists to bring the benefits of sunlight indoors.

LA DIFFÉRENCE
VERPLEX
Le savoir faire
Notre conseil d’administration est composé de deux associés, anciennement employés de Hickey Canada, une entreprise de réputation internationale. Nous œuvrons dans le domaine des lanterneaux en acrylique depuis plusieurs décennies. Notre expérience est donc basée sur nos vastes connaissances de la technologie, des matériaux utilisés, des techniques de fabrication de nos produits, du marché et du climat Nord-Américain en ce qui concerne les puits de lumière.
La technologie

Des lanterneaux robuste et fiable.

Le design de l’encadrement d’un lanterneau fait appel à une technologie supérieur comparable aux fenêtres verticales. Les lanterneaux des séries Verplex V150. V250 et V350 pour les lanterneaux en acrylique et polycarbonate incorporent une barrière thermique continue en polyuréthane haute densité d’une grande efficacité. La série V450 est un modèle ancestral en pyramide muni d’une ventilation par gravité et construit entièrement en aluminium.

La qualité supérieure
Quelle que soit l’application, les puits de lumière sont conçus et fabriqués selon les normes de qualité rigoureuse de Verplex tant au point de vue de l’exécution que des matériaux utilisés afin de fournir le meilleur rendement énergétique et de durabilité du lanterneau.

At Bayshore Gifts in Glass we are passionate about the artwork we create, and we make a lot of it! Our artists specialize in glass-blowing, flame-working, as well as glass cremation art!

​

We like to consider our glass studio one of Winnipeg's "hottest" attractions, because we make everything on site. 

​

All our glass artwork is hand-made with care and precision, each individual piece is entirely unique and one-of-a-kind!

​

Our glass gallery is filled with pieces we've conjured up from our imagination, but what we really love are your custom orders! We specialize in creating highly personal pieces for our customers for any occasion, and we appreciate the challenge of transforming your ideas into thoughtful gifts for your loved ones!

​

We also have free shipping for anyone in the United States of America and Canada.

What can you find here?

You can find everything from figurines and jewelry, including our "Name on a Grain of Rice" necklaces, to plates, coasters, wine stoppers and cake toppers! If you don't see exactly what you were looking for, our artists will happily create a custom order, personalized for you. We can ship orders anywhere!

​

If you want to know more, like us on Facebook and follow us on Instagram for news, updates and special promotions! We love to stay connected with our customers, so tag us in your posts of our work and keep us in the loop!

NORTH AMERICA’S LEADING BEVERAGE CAN SUPPLIER AND FULL-SERVICE GROWTH PARTNER FOR CRAFT BEVERAGE
CRAFTING GROWTH – TOGETHER
Your Beverage Canning Partner
Craft Coast is more than a beverage packing supplier; we’re your trusted long-term partner. We proudly collaborate with breweries, wineries, cideries, and producers of non-alcoholic products. With a foundation of trust and respect, we have successfully helped our partners bring their products to market. As a can specialist, we offer an extensive range of options such as brite cans, sleeved cans, labelled cans, digitally printed cans, and low MOQ dry offset printed cans. Experience the perfect blend of partnership and unparalleled can solutions for your beverage brand.
A Driven Team
At Craft Coast, our team is driven by a passion for seeing our beverage partners succeed. We're dedicated to providing a great work environment for our staff and to providing the support and expertise that our partners need to take their operations to the next level.
Sustainability Focused
Everything we do has sustainability in mind. We search and source the most sustainable packaging you will find anywhere, including our exclusive Plant-Based Film shrink labels. We have strategic shipping locations throughout North America, allowing you to minimize shipping distances and therefore your carbon footprint. Sustainability: we don’t just say it, we do it.
Full-Service Beverage Canning
From beverage copacking to mobile canning to brand design, our robust service offering covers all aspects of packaging, so our beverage partners can focus on what they do best – brewing awesome beverages!

Partnered With Craft Beverage Producers Since 2017

CRAFT COAST'S COMMITMENT TO BEVERAGE PARTNER SUCCESS
BEVERAGE CANNING HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER

From slim to standard, shrink sleeve cans or blank cans – we’ve got access to the aluminum cans our beverage partners need.

Beverage Trays & Boxes


Easy beverage packaging

Our trays and boxes make beverage canning easy. Get shelf-ready boxes and moisture-resistant trays.
Beverage Ends


Ends for every can!

We supply high-quality aluminum beverage can ends and tabs, for almost every can size.
Beverage Can Carriers


Choose from two kinds of can carrier.

Choose from PakTech® can carriers made of recycled plastic or biodegradable E6PR™ Eco Rings.

OUR SERVICES
Our goal is the success of our beverage partners, whatever their beverage canning needs are.

Whether you’re just starting out or a large scale manufacturer, the team at Craft Coast has you covered.

We’re here to support your business through every stage of growth, giving you access to equipment, facilities, expertise, and great pricing on all of your packaging supplies.

Mobile Canning

With our mobile canning services, we bring the canning equipment and expertise right to your door. In-house canning is full of hidden costs and headaches. Craft Coast makes canning easy and affordable for beverage manufacturers of all sizes.

With an easy scheduling process, the Craft Coast team will come onsite and take care of everything from logistics to quality assurance to materials.

Available in select North American regions. Please contact us to learn more about our mobile canning service areas.

Copacking Services

Whether you’re in the kombucha game, vodka soda, or even the energy drink game – tap into the Craft Coast team’s extensive blending and canning experience, and take the guesswork out of production. Whatever your beverage is – you name it, we do it!

Craft Coast also offers a pilot batch program where you can get a small batch of your product. Pilot packages include 500L of beverage product, shelf-life and stability testing, packaging materials, and more.

Creative and Graphic Design

The creative process for shrink sleeve and printed can labels is easy with our Creative and Graphic Design Team. From consultation to design to CFIA and FDA compliance, our beverage partners benefit from our graphic and creative teams’ experience and knowledge.

Technical Services

Crystal Glass

Atelier Bière & Vin

Wine and beer enthusiasts at heart, our team has over 38 years combined experience in home wine making and brewing. In our shop you will find all types wine and beer yeasts (liquid and dry). Carboys, fermenters, hydrometers, bottles, corks, all kinds of malts and a lot more. You will also have someone to guide you in your fermenting adventures. Come visit us to understand why we have been open for so long!

Just check out our Google reviews.

1
Select your wine kit

Pass by our store and select your wine kit, fill out a simple contract, and square off your bill (an extra fee of 40$ and taxes will be added to the price of your kit for the onsite service).

Shop wine kit
2
You add the yeast

Now the fun begins, we head to the back of the shop, we prepare your mix and you add the yeast. Then we part our ways for 4 to 8 weeks pending on your kit.

3
Bottling

Once the wine is stabilized and filtered we contact you and setup a bottling date. Present yourself at the store on bottling day with your clean bottles and use our equipment to bottle. Once the bottling has been completed you leave with the wine and store it at home. Labels, shrink caps, and corks are not included in the price.

A staff member will always be there to assist you!

The Little Glass Hut, Lebret, SK


Magestic Loon


Juried Member of the Saskatchewan Craft Council
The Little Glass Hut

The Little Glass Hut is a quaint little house that lends itself well to being a studio and retail outlet for gifts and art. We feature the stained glass of owner Dorothy Ball and showcase the work of other Saskatchewan and Canadian Artists. We are always looking for unique work to display on consignment.

The HUT is on Highway 56 located in Lebret, one of the oldest settlements in Saskatchewan. We are open on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays from May to December including statutory holidays.

The beautiful Roman Catholic Church rests on the shores of Mission Lake surrounded by the hills of the Qu'Appelle Valley.

Dorothy Ball

I began doing stained glass over 15 years ago in the mid 1990's. In 2004, my dream of having my own shop became a reality.

You will find me busy making new creations in the back of the store. It's a small area but I find room to teach classes on Thursday evenings.

I enjoy working with people and it is a big thrill for me should you choose to purchase a piece of my work. Knowing that some of my work is traveling to another land is quite amazing to me.

The hummingbird, a regular visitor in the valley, has become my logo. I enjoy making various versions of this hard working marvel of nature. You can find it in my stepping stones, window hangings or just by itself.

Whenever you drive through the valley, stop in and say hello and better yet, buy yourself a keepsake from Lebret. Whether you come from down the road, across Canada or from far away, I love to have you sign my Guest Book.

Whether it's a stepping stone, a night light, an Angel, or a larger window hanging, I'm sure that we can find something you'd like. If not we can design something together.

Calgary's connection for stained glass!

• supplies for all glass needs


• classes in stained glass, fusing, glass painting, mosaics!


• studio space for rent


• custom windows, sidelights, transoms, door inserts and pantry panels


• exceptional giftware, antiquities, art, jewellery, pottery, lamps

Check out our fabulous gift shop
showcasing Alberta's finest artisans!


Did you know we offer a "House of Magpie" Membership...

Membership Includes:
• Unlimited drop-in time (space permitting)
• 20% off all supplies and classes (excludes giftware)
Get some project guidance, learn new tips & tricks, see equipment demo's,
have a peek at all the staff's books & more!


Whether you need a reason to complete those unfinished projects or are
not sure how to tackle that new one, someone here at the
"House of Magpies" will be able to offer assistance.
Price of a membership is only $200 for a whole year (or $100 for a half year) of fun and friendship!
This is a great opportunity to connect with glass enthusiasts of all kinds!


Creative expression is part of everyday life & Muk Luk Magpies welcomes you to come in and explore your untapped creative potential!

 

Please note: *As Covid-19 is an extremely contagious disease, we ask that if you are not feeling well or showing signs of illness that you refrain from entering the premises. We will be happy to rebook your class and or offer curbside pickup for supplies.


To maintain a safe environment for our customers, students & the MLM staff we ask that everyone please make use of the hand sanitizing station upon entry and note face masks are required depending on provincial regulations. THANK YOU!

Client Reviews
We ordered the custom made fiberglass doors with European locking system from MD Doors. We are very (100%) pleased with the details and the quality of the doors. MD Doors customer service is excellent. Steve was very helpful in assisting me with door selections that match both the exterior and interior of the house. Steve also followed up to make sure that the doors were installed perfectly. After searching through many companies for high quality doors, service and price, MD Doors was my first choice.
Bev
Vaughan
We contracted with MD Doors to install a new front door at the end of November. They knew we wished to get the new door installed before the new year, and were able to book us in for December 29th. Mike and Eugene (hope I got their names right) installed the door and were fantastic - friendly, professional and very focused on making sure everything was installed perfectly. We got a door completely different from anything else in the neighbourhood, and it looks amazing - we received quotes from other companies but no others seemed to have a door that matched our garage so perfectly, plus were very reasonably priced. This door is fiberglass (higher R-value), with a European locking system. We are EXTREMELY pleased we went with MD Doors, and with our new door
Anna
Vaughan
Chose an outstanding wrought iron door insert & side panels - this firm was very professional, honest and most of all delivered what they promised - installers we very precise and cleaned up too!
Franca C
Woodbridge
Steve and Mark were very helpful and reasonable in recommending replacement doors and locks for my front entry. Their installers were very good, arrived on time and were flexible with timelines for installation. The doors are of high quality and arrived as estimated. Highly recommend and will use again.
Jason
Woodbridge
I wanted to maintain the character and age of my home in uptown Toronto. Finding an arched top front door is impossible unless you go custom. MD Doors was an amazing alternative to the other Toronto manufacturers. I brought my desired design to MD Doors and they were able to match it exactly -- they even provided me with drawings that showed my design photoshopped onto my house. The final product is awesome -- check out the pics. MD Doors uses a unique overlapping door closure system that provides for a really tight weather seal. They included choices of hardware as well as stain glass (or in my case leaded glass) options. I couldn't give them a 10/10 because there were significant delays beyond their initial installation timing. Despite the delay, I would still recommend MD Doors
BB Sam
Toronto
I live in a 120+ year Victorian house in Cabbagetown. I wanted to 'refresh' my exterior - and went with new brick work (Hunt Heritage Masonry ) and new black slate roof with copper dormer, flashing and gutters (M&R Roofing). However, my exterior front door had developed cracks - and was draughty . Finding a solid wood door and transom was not an easy task. After speaking to many local suppliers, I found a gorgeous door system at a reasonable cost. Steve at MD Doors was most helpful in proposing various options - and I selected a beautiful, pre-finished European solid 'ash' door - naturally finished with multi-lock system, with transom window above. Although they offered multiple glass options, I went with antiqued custom-made glass made into themopanes from Cascade Hand Cut Crystal Inc. MD Doors picked up and installed the two glass inserts into the door system before bringing it on-site. The installation crew was extremely professional, courteous and meticulous. Very diligent and great cleanup after the work was completed. Strongly recommend MD Doors for a great product and professional service. Howard from Old Toronto
Howard Goshulak
Old Toronto
I had a hard time finding good quality front door inserts for a reasonable price. I say reasonable because even though they are more expensive than their competition, you can really see the quality in where the joins of the frame are. It feels like their insert are built better and will last longer. We went into the showroom and they were very friendly with us.

Would definitely recommended MD Doors to anyone looking to upgrade their Doors or Windows!

Studio time

Join now!
Why wait? Become a member today!
Retail

Glasstronomy Studios is always stocked with the basic necessities for both stained glass and glass fusing. 96 COE glass and accessories, project kits, special promotions, “what’s new” and Studio custom products are also for sale in studio to both members and non-members. All other product can be ordered by our members from our dealer direct catalogues.

As a service-focused studio, we offer professional panel framing, pattern design, kiln firing, customer support and the guidance needed to select the correct material for your project.

Studio Spots

Our latest offering for members is our Studio Spots learning modules page accessible from the Memberships menu. These modules showcase glass materials, techniques, and tools. Click on any applicable module link and it will launch our YouTube channel in a separate browser window. Our members have exclusive access to the entire series. Stay tuned for more!

Non-members can view a sample by clicking here.

Adult art glass workshops and courses

With the short days of winter, glass is the perfect medium to bring light into your personal space. This season’s projects offer light in many forms, whether a candle holder, nightlight, table lamp, or window panel. Whatever your level of glass crafting experience, these projects, both large and small, will add sparkle, illumination, and colour to your décor. Nurture your glass skills and let your creativity flourish!

For more information, visit the Winter 2025 | Season of light page or view the Workshops and courses — Winter 2025 brochure. Registration is now open.

Happy New Year!

Welcome back! We are open and Studio time is back in the schedule. We hope to see you in Studio soon!

Studio hours

The Studio is back on standard hours. Plan your visit by checking our calendar or calling 905.415-9777.

Tue 10 am–5 pm / Studio time 7–10 pm
Wed 10 am–5 pm
Thu 10 am–5 pm / Studio time 1–4 pm
Fri 10 am–4 pm
Sat 10 am–4 pm

Small Business Arts Mentorship Program (SBAM)

In 2022, we introduced a new tier in our membership program tailored to offer graduating or emerging arts creatives and entrepreneurs an opportunity to learn hands-on best practices on how to operate a sustainable arts business in our creative Studio environment. For more information, visit the Small Business Arts Mentorship Program (SBAM) page.

In the news

For information on the current glass manufacturing issues in the US and other happenings, check out our News page.

Support your local artists and crafts people

To find out where our members are selling/showing their work, check out the Member makers' calendar page.

Open studio
Studio time

Sessions are typically held on most Tuesday nights from 7 to 10 pm and Thursday afternoons from 1 to 4 pm. Click here to reserve a spot in an upcoming session.

Non-member, Artist, Community, and Instructor level member fee: $30 + HST (free to Studio level members)

Learning program
Beginner in Studio learning

Looking for upcoming beginner opportunities? Check out the beginner courses coming up in 2025 by visiting the 2025 | Beginner preview page or viewing the Beginner courses — 2025 | Preview brochure. Registration is now open.

If you want to receive notifications on upcoming learning events via email, contact us at info@glasstronomystudios.ca and we will add you to our mailing list.

INTRODUCING THE FIRST IN CANADA

EOlife X is a manual ventilation training device that provides you with live feedback to ensure you are providing the best ventilations possible.

This is ONLY for training purposes!

EOLIFE X VENTILATION TRAINING DEVICE

EOlife X Ventilation Training Device was recently named the 2022 EMSWorld Innovation Award Winner!




LEARN MORE
AIRWAY MANAGEMENT: A CRUCIAL PART OF CPR

EOlife X teaches you about airway management and good ventilation techniques regardless of the users level of experience and they type of patient being ventilated.

Provides feedback on leaks and its bar graph displays the volumes of inhaled and exhaled in real time, teaching you how to:

Position and seal the mask more effectively

Use the jaw-thrust manoeuvre correctly to avoid gastric inflation

Intubate successfully

2 TYPES OF TRAINING MODES

EOlife X provide you with 2 different training modes:

Blind Ventilation Interface which can record and evaluate ventilation parameters during manual ventilation without providing live feedback.

Monitored Ventilation Interface provides live feedback on your manual ventilation.  It provides Insufflated volume, Tidal Volume, Rate and indicates whether you have a leakage.

EOLIFE X NOW INCLUDES A PEDIATRIC VENTILATION TRAINING INTERFACE!
EOLIFE X DEMO
FEATURES AND BENEFITS

Shock Resistant

Quick start without needing calibration

5 hours of battery life

(rechargeable)

CPR Mode- 30:2 or Continuous

EOlife X Connect app

BETTER TRAINING SAVES LIVES

Proper Ventilation is tough to teach. 

30% of ventilated patients have gastric inflation and 80% of patient are hyperventilated. 

 Its estimated that 35-85% of patient have an improper sized mask/improper mask position causing excessive leaks.

EOLIFE X CONNECT

This provides users and trainers with the detail they need to closely monitor:

Overall performance

Progress throughout the course/program

Details on volumes insufflated

Details of how well leaks are managed

Details of ventilation rates

EOLIFE X IS NOW IN STOCK

We currently have EOlife X in stock and ready to ship.

Ready Heat Blankets

Ready- Heat Blankets are individually sealed and are activated once exposed to oxygen outside of its packaging.




Available in a variety of sizes: 1 panel, 4 Panel, 6 Panel, 12 panel and Ready Heat Vest




The Ready-Heat II™ blanket is designed specifically as a first responder blanket to treat shock and hypothermia. It warms to a minimum 100°F/37.8°C in 10 minutes and will maintain that minimum heat for 6 hours. The blanket has a foam core and is lightweight and comfortable. The blanket has a 5 year shelf life and is individually wrapped in a translucent polybag.

Photo Gallery
WHATS NEW WITH FENIX FLASHLIGHTS
FENIX LCL26R HIGH PERFORMANCE CAMPING LANTERN

CL26R is a high-performance rechargeable camping lantern. Its maximum brightness is 400 lumens and the longest runtime is as high as 400 hours. This compact and portable lantern can provide camping illumination for 2 to 4 persons. It offers IP66 protection and a Micro USB charging port. Its power comes from one 18650 Li-on battery or two CR123A lithium batteries. Both in-tent illumination and camping illumination are available. Undoubtedly, CL26R will be your best partner during outdoor activities.

FENIX PD36R TACTICAL FLASHLIGHT

The PD36R is an ultra-compact flashlight with a powerful USB Type-C charging port. Driven by a long-lasting 21700/5000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery, the light emits a max output of 1600 lumens and 283 meters. Dual switches control five output levels and strobe for easy and fast operation. Additional features include battery level indicator, smart output memory and two-position body clip, all which enhance daily usage in outdoor activities and tactical applications.

FENIX LR40R RECHARGEABLE FLASHLIGHT

The Fenix LR40R is a high-performance rechargeable ultra-compact searching flashlight that combines spot- and floodlight. Catering for numerous outdoor and extreme environments, this light is a indispensable helper in cave exploring, searching and rescuing, as well as to act as a backup light for drivers.

UN TROPHÉE, UNE ŒUVRE D'ART

Quand la grandeur d’une personne requiert un trophée hors du commun,
nos trophées sont là pour souligner l’exception.

	

TROPHÉE PRÊT-À-OFFRIR

POUR LES GRANDS GAGNANTS

	
TROPHÉE EXCLUSIF

POUR LE PRESTIGE

	
INTÉGRATION ARCHITECTURALE

POUR LES PROJETS D’ENVERGURE

	
CADEAU CORPORATIF

POUR FAIRE PLAISIR

Michel Leclerc, artiste verrier, utilise sa créativité et son talent pour concevoir et réaliser vos trophées.

Pour la transparence et la brillance, l’artisan utilise toujours un verre de très haute qualité.

Que vous choisissiez un trophée exclusif ou un modèle parmi ceux de notre collection prête-à-offrir, les lauréats les exposeront avec fierté, car ce sont de véritables œuvres d’art.

Un trophée haut de gamme en verre réalisé par l’artisan Michel Leclerc est le gage de votre considération envers la personne remarquable à qui il est destiné.

Réalisés dans notre atelier, les trophées sont ensuite remis lors de votre événement pour souligner l’excellence d’un collaborateur, le dévouement et la fidélité d’un employé ou encore la réussite d’un pair.

Offerts par des fondations, des associations, des sociétés ou des regroupements, nos trophées sont toujours au service de votre reconnaissance…

Des organismes de toutes natures ont acquis un trophée de notre conception : des hôpitaux, des associations professionnelles, des congrégations religieuses, des organismes à but non lucratif et, évidemment, plusieurs entreprises privées.
