Common Glass Repair and Replacement FAQ
Can you repair cracked or chipped glass, or does it need to be replaced?

​​We’ll assess the crack or chip glass to determine the safest and best long-term solution. Whether we repair or replace the glass depends on the extent of the damage, costs of repair, and other safety considerations. While we can provide a general estimate over the phone or online,  final pricing will require an in-person inspection of the damage. Our goal is always to restore the glass while ensuring safety and visual clarity, and adhering to the National Windshield Repair Association (NWRA) standards.

Do you provide emergency glass repair services?

Yes, Glass Doctor offers emergency services 24/7 for both residential and commercial glass needs. Our emergency services include securing exposed windows and doors with board-ups and taking measurements for replacement glass to ensure your property is safe and secure as quickly as possible.

Are your glass repair technicians licensed and insured?

All Glass Doctor franchises repair windshields to NWRA standards, and their locations are registered with the Auto Glass Replacement Safety Standards Council (AGRSS), which ensures a high level of professional standards and expertise. For specifics on licensing and insurance, contact your local Glass Doctor, as these details can vary by location.

Do you offer warranties or guarantees on your glass services?

Yes, Glass Doctor provides the Windshield Protection Plan, which covers unlimited repairs and one replacement within 12 months of the original windshield installation, highlighting our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. Additionally, the Glass Doctor Advantage Plan offers various benefits, including a 15% savings on all future repairs for home and auto and a guarantee against breakage for the term of the membership, with some exceptions.

Can you assist with insurance claims for glass repair or replacement?

Absolutely. Glass Doctor will contact your insurance for you to verify coverage, file claims, and handle all the necessary paperwork. Our specialists are well-versed in working with insurance providers, making the process seamless and hassle-free for our customers.

Find Glass Replacement & Glass Repair Near You

Glass Doctor is the go-to source for all of your glass repair and replacement  – whether you’re seeking glass services for your home, business, or automobile, our service professionals offer the experience, knowledge, and tools to get the job done right every time. You can be confident your glass work is being performed correctly and to the highest standard, which we back up with the Neighborly Done Right Promise™.

Glass Doctor operates over 270 North American locations, so there’s a good chance there’s one right in your neighborhood! Find a location near you today!

Certified Backflow Testing, Installation and Repair

For Vancouver and Lower Mainland, BC

Schedule Our Expertise to Reduce the Risks of Water Contamination

SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT TODAY
Setting Standards with MDT Backflow, British Columbia

MDT Backflow-Water Protection is committed to keeping your water safe. Our family-owned business caters to all backflow needs in Vancouver, Surrey, Richmond, Burnaby, Delta, Port Coquitlam, Mission, New Westminster, North Vancouver, UBC, Port Moody, Coquitlam, and surrounding Lower Mainland areas in BC (British Columbia), Canada. Talk to us for more insights!

Our Objective

We strive to ensure safe drinking water for you. You can conveniently schedule our expert services for detailed backflow testing, repair, and installation services. We pride ourselves on educating water customers, such as you, on how to reduce the risk of inadvertently contaminating your private or the public water supply.

Why Do I Need My Backflow Assessed?

Backflow assemblies and devices come with parts prone to break-downs and wear-outs, similar to your car parts. Annual tests of backflow certify the drinking water supplied to your home remains safe. Because backflow assembly parts are delicate, most Lower Mainland cities have created by-laws to help ensure the safety of our drinking water.

Trained Staff

At MDT Backflow, we have certified backflow assembly testers on staff, who have attended a rigorous training program and are certified by the BCWWA to inspect, test, and repair all backflow assemblies and devices.

Areas We Serve

Our specialists for top-notch backflow testing, backflow installation, and backflow repair cater to Vancouver, Surrey, Richmond, Burnaby, Delta, Port Coquitlam, Mission, New Westminster, North Vancouver, UBC, Port Moody, Coquitlam, and surrounding Lower Mainland areas in BC (British Columbia), Canada.

What Is Backflow?

It is the undesirable reversal of flow in a potable (drinking) water distribution system due to back-siphonage or back-pressure.

What is Back-Pressure?

It is any condition creating pressure in the non-potable piping system greater than in the potable water system. E.g., Pressure caused by gravity due to elevation differences.

What is Back-Siphonage?

It is a form of backflow due to negative or sub-atmospheric pressure within a potable water system.

WELCOME TO S&S CREATIONS

Have you ever dreamed about owning your own exclusive stained glass windows or lampshade, or wanted to own a unique hand crafted piece of stone art?

Or what about a unique custom made countertop for your kitchen or bathroom - hand crafted from local puddingstone (or Jasper Conglomorate to use its proper name) which is unique to the Bruce Mines area?


	 	

At S & S Creations we can make your dreams a reality - whether it's your own idea, one of our originals or a combination of both, we can bring your vision to life and create that magical piece of art for your home.

With over 10 years experience no project is too big or too small - we have a vast supply of materials to choose from so why not give us a call or come in to see us . We will work closely with you to make sure that your dreams become the reality you are looking for.

Our vision and inspiration for all that we create stems from the beauty and shapes formed by nature itself.

CONTEMPORARY ART GLASS
THE STUDIO
Art Glass Icicles & Holiday Canes

or·na·ment (n). Something that decorates or adorns; an embellishment, an object that adds beauty to something.

Filigree glass was invented in Murano by glass masters Filippo and Bernardo Serena in 1527, an elaborate process that was indeed difficult to perform. It would be 10 years before other glassmakers on the Island of Murano would reproduce , copy or imitate this technique and hundreds of years before this secret would be revealed to the rest of the world. Filigree Glass, unlike conventional blown glass, was suitable for only the uppermost tables of society as it was not common. This elaborate form of Filigrana Glass is responsible for the fame of Murano style glass today. Currently, with new design innovations and increasing levels of workmanship, the patterns able to be embedded in filigree glass appear to be limitless. Bringing much appreciation and joy to collectors of the beloved Filigree Glass technique.

Today after much experimentation, Virginia Wilson Toccalino brings you lovely Filigree and Ribbon Glass Icicles. Each filigree, lace-like cane is composed of groups of glass rods that involve a process of fusing, layering pulling and twisting the glass. This process is done personally by Virginia and her husband Tony Toccalino at the furnace while working in their glass studio. The ribbon glass icicles are selected pieces of flattened colored glass embedded in the crystal, pulled and twisted to create swirling glass ribbons within. Colors and dimensions may vary slightly. Thank you for supporting Handmade in Canada Art glass!

Our Expertise
Elected Associate of the British Society of Master Glass Painters ~ Professional Member of the Stained Glass Association of America.

John and Laura Gilroy AMGP, SGAA have been creating stained glass since 1984 when they began an intensive apprentice education in what was then England’s oldest studio founded in 1788. Together they design and fabricate authentic stained glass to commission, and have extensive experience restoring all ages of stained glass. Each project is uniquely created by hand, and they undertake the entire process from design through to installation. They are one of the few studios in Canada that specialize in traditional and contemporary vitreous glass painting and leading at their Greater Vancouver studio in beautiful British Columbia.

CIRCA

Circa is a one of a kind online gallery in Canada, that imports MID CENTURY MODERN Art Glass from around the world. All the items are hand-blown works of art from the 1940-1960, with the focus on European studios.

ITALIAN, SCANDANAVIAN, FRENCH, BELGIAN and CZECH. Circa also specializes in European Vintage ART GLASS LAMPS from studios such as SEGUSO, VAL ST.LAMBERT, CENEDESE, DAUM, VANNES, COFRAC and ORREFORS.

Owner and curator Brian Imeson has spent several years collecting, and searches the major European centres, to bring world class VINTAGE ART GLASS to Calgary and Canada.

A visit to the online gallery is an education in the MID CENTURY MODERN styling of VINTAGE ART GLASS. A visual spectacle of color, form and modernism.

MID CENTURY MODERN

The MID CENTURY MODERN style is defined by its modern forms, biomorphic shapes, sensual lines and exceptional quality in materials and workmanship. Bright, intense, vivid colors are characteristic of this period. Forged in the furnaces of post war Europe and North America, the art glass from this period ranges from sophisticated in form, to abstract in nature. Vases, vessels, lamps and figurative pieces are unique in style and distinctive in both execution and interpretation. The artists and designers from various studios in Europe all touched the genre with their style, individualism and artistic flare. Creating some of the most unique and sought after art glass pieces of this century. Highly collectible and prized the world over.

Stained Glass or Mosaic Workshop – $120.00 $79.99 Join us for a 2-hour Workshop – any day/any time!

Glass Mosaic Canada is your source for mosaic supplies, as well as a school of Mosaic & Stained Glass located in Etobicoke, Ontario, in the west end of Toronto. We are the official North American distributor of  Perdomo hand-made  Mexican Smalti and the Italian Montolit nippers

We carry a wide variety of mosaic tiles, including vitreous glass (both 20x20mm and 10x10mm mini), Opus Romano 12x12mm,  as well as Marble , Tiny Recycled glass tiles 8mmx8mm, and  Gold & Mirror tiles. We also offer other tools and supplies, such as Nippers, adhesive, grout, Do It Yourself (DIY) kits, Montolit nippers and Wedi board. Glass Mosaic Canada is more than happy to work with wholesalers, retailers, artists, architects, designers, educators and curators to provide all of your Mosaic and Stained Glass needs.

We specialize in creating art using mosaics and stained glass for windows, doors, backsplashes for kitchens or bathrooms, public murals, schools, tabletops, church icons or windows, mirrors, and fireplace surrounds.

Our Mosaic and Stained Glass courses are very unique art activites for children and adults are held in our studio in Toronto, Ontario, located on The Queensway in Etobicoke. We teach the traditional Roman technique of making mosaic, one of the most ancient forms of art known to man. Join us to discover that learning can be fun and therapeutic, great for time and stress management. Come relax with others, or if you prefer, strengthen the family bond on one of our Family Workshop days! We look forward to seeing you! We also can travel to run the course any where with any number of participants.

If you have any questions about mosaic or stained glass, please do not hesitate to Contact Us.

ACCUEIL
À PROPOS
SERVICES
NOS RÉALISATIONS
CONTACT
ENGLISH
VERRE LE FUTUR
L’EXPERT DU VERRE ET DU MIROIR SUR LA RIVE-SUD
Parlez-nous de votre projet
Vous êtes à la recherche d’un vitrier sur la Rive-Sud?
Contactez-nous pour tous vos projets verre et miroir !

Chez Verre Le Futur, nous sommes vos spécialistes du verre et du miroir sur la Rive-Sud et partout au Québec. Découvrir Verre Le Futur, c’est entrer dans le monde du design unique et raffiné. En effet, notre équipe réalise des projets de vitrerie sur mesure pour toutes les pièces intérieures, ainsi que pour l’extérieur.

Avec Verre Le Futur, il n’y a pas de limites à votre imagination. Vous n’avez qu’à nous partager vos exigences : dimensions, formes, motifs à représenter, tout sera fait selon vos goûts. Notre service personnalisé en vitrerie nous permet de travailler le verre de multiples façons : sculpté, sablé ou gravé, trempé, thermoformé ou martelé… Quant au miroir, nous pouvons le décorer et le tailler pour un style original et un décor unique, grâce à nos designs exclusifs.

De plus, que vous soyez un particulier, un commerçant ou un industriel, notre entreprise est à votre service depuis 1974. Chez Verre Le Futur, nous faisons régulièrement affaires avec des architectes, des plombiers ou encore avec des décorateurs lors de rénovations ou pour des constructions neuves. Verre Le Futur est reconnu pour respecter vos exigences et vous offrir un service excellent en vitrerie sur la Rive-Sud de Montréal, de la prise de contact jusqu’à l’installation.

Chez Verre Le Futur, nous respectons les normes pour la sécurité et la hauteur qui correspondent à chacune des villes où nous allons. Nous avons des fermetures automatiques contrôlées hydrauliquement avec barrure magnétique.

Vous avez des projets de rénovation en vitrerie? Des idées de design en verre? Faites-nous confiance pour les réaliser.

Important : Chez Verre Le Futur, nous travaillons uniquement sur rendez-vous. Il est donc impératif que vous preniez un rendez-vous avant de vous présenter à l’atelier. Contactez-nous au 450-674-2473 ou prenez rendez-vous ici.

Réalisons vos idées
Services offerts
Douche en verre
Garde-corps en verre
Rampe en verre
Comptoir et lavabo
Mur, porte-miroir
Meuble
Clôture de piscine
Et plus encore

DÉPOSITAIRE OFFICIEL DU VERRE ANTI-TACHE SHOWERGUARD®

Verre Le Futur est un dépositaire officiel du verre ShowerGuard®, fabriqué par Guardian InGlass. Ce verre doté d’une couche de protection est facile à nettoyer malgré le calcaire dans l’eau. Antitache et garanti à vie, c’est un matériau idéal pour les portes et parois de douches.

Nous travaillons avec les produits de la quincaillerie CR Laurence et de la Quincaillerie Richelieu

STAINED GLASS

SUPPLIES AND STUDIO

 

"For me a stained glass window is a transparent partition between my heart and the heart of the world"

Marc Chagall

Click here to view our Facebook page
OUR SERVICES

We are pleased to be open for in-store shopping and look forward to helping you with your stained glass needs.

​

Huronia Art Glass has over 32 years of experience and everything you need to complete your stained glass project.

 

Glass Squares

Sheet Glass

Solder

Chemicals

Lamp Bases & accessories

Bevel & Bevel Sets

Foil

Came

Tools such as cutters & pliers

Library of Pattern Books to view and copy

Grinders

Garden Stakes

Ring Saws

Kilns available by special order

 

Repairs - This is one area of expertise in which we specialize. If you have ever tried to remove a piece of glass without ruining the soldering around adjoining pieces, then you know how difficult it can be.  Leave it to the experts!

​

Gift Cards - Available in any denomination.  A perfect gift for any glass enthusiast.

​

​

HOW DO I GET STARTED IN STAINED GLASS?

Try our Beginner course where you and other novice students will receive all of the guidance and hands-on practice to make your first time project.   Instruction is given step-by-step and you can work at your own pace. You'll will learn about the different methods of doing stained glass and walk away with three completed projects, too!

Click here for more FAQs
WORKSHOPS
& COURSES
Click here to view our workshops
Click here to view our courses
OUR TEAM
Gord Hawthorne Owner
Stella
Official Greeter
Norma Vowels
Beginner & Intermediate Instructor
​

As for many people, I started stained glass as a hobby and fell in love with it.  That was over 30 years ago and I became particularly interested in Tiffany style lamps. I opened this store and studio over 27 years ago and have become one of the most premier teaching and supply locations for stained and art glass in the province. I am very proud of what we have accomplished here and find it very rewarding to be able to share my passion for stained glass art with you.

Debbie Hirsch
Intermediate Instructor

Debbie has been with us since 2002 when we first opened this location.  Many will know her from her working in the store on Sundays but her many years of experience gives her the skills and knowledge to teach the intermediate classes.  Her warm, friendly manner will make you feel welcome.

As a tradition, we've always had Golden Retrievers as Official Greeters at the store.  We first had Bayley, then who many of you knew, Maddie.   We love Golden's for their friendliness and sweet nature - an excellent choice for such a big job.  

​

Well, we now have Stella.  She is a confident, strong willed and intelligent pup who will welcome you with enthusiasm, a wagging tail and is always happy to receive belly rubs. 

Norma also teaches our Beginners and Intermediate stained glass classes on Saturday and Wednesday mornings and Tuesday nights.  Her friendly nature will make you feel at ease as she offers hands-on help with your project.  Whether beginner or intermediate, you will learn a lot and have fun creating your own masterpiece under the direction of Norma.

Tresea Partridge
Fused Glass Instructor
​
Susan Dalrymple
Open Studio and Workshop Instructor

Tresea is an artist who has been involved with the glass medium for over a decade. Her passion started with an introduction to stained glass and she has been in love with it ever since. Her art has moved into the fused glass field and though self taught, she has great experience in many aspects of fused glass work. Her fused glass courses run the gamut from basic to specialized courses and even kids workshops. Her work can be seen the store and she always has a friendly smile, enthusiasm and encouragement for new artists.  

Susan has been working in stained glass for over 15 years.  She teaches several workshops and is the instructor for Open Studio on Thursdays.  Her work with stained glass began with a desire to be creative, but with the disciplined and skilled techniques required for working with glass. “You start with a pattern or idea, and the colours in the glass bring the image to life.”  She is an enthusiastic and supportive instructor who really enjoys teaching and seeing students succeed.

HURONIA
ART
GLASS

680 Bayview Dr. Unit #3
Barrie, Ontario L4N 9A6

WELCOME TO THE SPECTACULAR GLASS ART OF

Relkie Art Glass

Welcome to the spectacular glass art of Relkie Art Glass. For over 40 years Neil has channeled his artistic talents into stained, sandblasted, carved and fused glass, ranging from bold, colorful imagery to subtle accents, wildlife to abstracts. His designs bestow individuality, character, and beauty for home and business. A traditional art form with a modern spin, his glass becomes a long lasting cherished art form. He is truly a craftsmen in a world of mass production!

Entry ways, doors, windows, panels and dividers are transformed into works of art glass for your residence or commercial business. Choose from hundreds of designs in our stained glass and art glass galleries, or we can custom design and built to your specifications to create the perfect piece for your décor.

Relkie Art Glass has been creating works of art glass since 1984.

Relkie Art Glass is pleased to announce we have been featured in the exclusive Perspectives on Design Western Canada coffee table book, a showcase of the regions finest architects, interior designers, artisan and craftsmen, under whose creative direction the extraordinary is possible.

About Us

ATG Architectural Tint & Graphics provides professional design and installation of a wide range of creative glazing applications including window tinting, decorative glass coatings, custom graphics and security/safety films. Trust Windows offers a free-estimate on both new installations and window replacements. Upgrade to energy efficient windows today and receive free financing. Contact us to schedule an in-house consultation at your convenience and learn more about the process today.

INSTALLATION

Supply Chains You Can Track
Products you can TRUST

LaFlesche was born out of the belief that it should be easy to access trustworthy and sustainable manufacturing services. That's why we built world class production facilities and operate them with a team of passionate and environmentally conscious experts. We are committed to creating a reliable supply chain you can track, and delivering products you can trust.

 

Our team will work alongside you to ensure your products deliver everything for you they're supposed to. We use the most sophisticated injection molding equipment so your parts stand up under pressure. Our innovation centre tests quality daily to make sure everything functions for you as it should.

 

As a full-service manufacturer, every item that leaves our hands is made in Canada and made with your success in mind.

Our Services

Whether you're making your first prototype or millions of injection molded copies, our high-tech facilities and team of expert designers, engineers, and technicians are standing by to get the job done. We offer the following services as your one-stop-shop for plastic parts development:

​

Product Development

Prototyping

Mold Making

Injection Molding

Medical Plastics

CNC Machining

Looking to make diagnostic tools, lab ware, personal protective equipment, dental or surgical devices, pharmaceutic supplies, or health and wellness products?

 

Our enthusiastic team of expert designers and technicians are ready to help turn your concepts into creations.

Learn More
Lost in a Sea of Information?
There are no dumb questions.

Many of our clients are innovators with no manufacturing experience. That's why we offer product development services to make your manufacturing journey stress-free from start to finish.

Ask Us Anything
About LaFlesche 

Located on traditional Mohawk territory in Kahnawà:ke, Quebec, our facilities are equipped with the most advanced manufacturing technologies. And to guide you every step of the way, our team is powered by experienced experts committed to world-class business practices and client care.

​

As an Indigenous business, values mean a lot to us. That's why we named our company after Dr. Susan La Flesche Picottte – North America’s first Indigenous medical doctor and a pioneer in her field. Emboldened by her commitment to marrying traditional wisdoms with modern advances in science, LaFlesche aims to likewise bring our heritage for good craftsmanship to all we do.

All About Us
WHO WE ARE.

IGG Glass is a leading Glass Fabrication facility producing commercial and industrial grade glass products and services in Toronto and the GTA.

Our cutting-edge 25,000 square feet facility employs the latest glass fabrication technologies and CNC machines capable of extremely precise operations.

IGG Glass uses a variety of fabrication techniques including glass cutting, grinding, drilling and laminating.  We also specialize in other glass fabricating operations including insulation, straight edge cutting, polishing and bending.

Our mission is to produce the best quality glass products at the best prices!

Don’t Hesitate To Ask

REQUEST A QUOTE

What We Can Do
OUR SERVICES

Our cutting-edge facility is capable of performing an assortment of glass fabrication operations including insulating, laminating, painting, tempering, heat strengthening and straight edge polishing.

CNC MACHINING
To achieve high precision operations such as cutting holes and round corners, we employ CNC machining to achieve high efficiency and the best outcomes.
READ MORE
GLASS INSULATING
Insulating glass consists of two or three glass window panes separated by a vacuum or gas filled space to reduce heat transfer across a part of the building envelope.
READ MORE
GLASS LAMINATING
Laminated glass is a type of safety glass that holds together when shattered. In the event of breaking, it is held in place by an interlayer between its two or more layers of glass.
READ MORE
GLASS PAINTING
Back painted or coated glass is a modern alternative to other surfacing materials such as tiles and laminates in the world's decorative and architectural industries.
READ MORE
GLASS TEMPERING
Tempered glass is a type of safety glass processed by controlled thermal or chemical treatments to increase its strength compared with normal glass.
READ MORE
HEAT SOAK TESTING
Heat soak testing is a technique used to minimize the risk of spontaneous tempered glass breakage due to nickel sulphide inclusions within the glass installed in a building.
READ MORE
HEAT STRENGTHENING
This is the process that makes the glass four to five times stronger than untreated glass. As a result, tempered glass is less likely to experience a thermal break.
READ MORE
STRAIGHT EDGE POLISHING
Straight or flat edge glass polishing refers to the fine grinding of glass by abrasives to produce smooth surfaces or for artistic purposes.
READ MORE
QUALITY COMES FIRST
We're a cutting-edge Glass Fabrication factory. Everything IGG Glass does is focused on one objective – Quality. It is in our nature to ensure our products are manufactured to the highest possible standards.

Building partnerships and communities, since 1978.
For 45+ years, we’ve set the standard for Canada’s best residential windows, doors and glass products. Our products frame the lives of real people and the communities we call home, so we treat every pane, panel and project as if they were for our own.

Sarasota Homes, Jensen Lakes

	

Check out our story

Take comfort,
not cover.

All Weather at Home is a purpose-built partner for Canada’s unpredictable seasons. Our full-service window and door manufacturing and regional installation services give you the peace of mind of a well-protected home and having chosen the right partner. From practical features and performance design, to stylish finishes, the All in our name means if you can think it, we can make it.

We have

ENERGY CALCULATOR

Take the first step
to savings.

Try our energy calculator to see which window configurations offer the best energy-efficiency for your home. Comfortable, eco-friendly and budget-wise. We call that a triple bottom line.

Get your thermal rating

NET-ZERO HOMES

Greener is smarter.
Did you know that up to 25% of your home’s energy costs could be due to your windows? Research from Natural Resources Canada suggests that because of the Canadian climate, we spend far more money each year on heating than we do on cooling our homes — which adds up to a lot of wasted money. ENERGY STAR® certified windows can not only help cut your energy costs, they go a long way to reducing the carbon footprint of your home.

 

The ‘ALL’ in our name means you came to the right place.

Extreme weather separates good windows and doors, from bad ones. Born and raised on the Canadian prairies, we know what it takes to make products that stand up to Canada’s unpredictable seasons. From heavy west coast rain to unforgiving blizzards, bitter cold and blistering heat, our products are designed and tested for whatever the weather has in store.

Canadian made.

In extreme climates, performance is the ultimate measure of quality. Our state-of-the-art window and door manufacturing facility changed the game nearly 20-years ago. Spanning 286,000 square feet, it’s where craft and creativity combine to make the best windows, doors and glass in Canada, period.

Smart savings.
As one of ENERGY STAR®’s most efficient manufacturers, we lead the scene for keeping it green. Partnering with key environmental organizations and building councils, we follow the strictest ENERGY STAR standards for quality framing, weather stripping and glass coating — helping home owners to reduce their energy costs and environmental footprint.
Safety, above the standard.

Safety is everything to us. From our employees to our partners, to you and your family at home with our products. We go above and beyond industry standards to uphold the most stringent safety policies and procedures, with rigorous testing and inspection every step of the way.

Custom when
it counts.

When it comes to the perfect fit, one size fits none. We take a smart and relentless approach to customizing our products and services to meet the unique needs of your project, big or small. Homeowners, contractors, dealers and builders all trust us for complete entry systems, that add value and beauty to any home, with service and style.

Welcome

Since 1535 in Thuringia,Germany,the methods and technics of working and blowing glass have been passed on generation after generation from father to son in the Rossbach family.Today, the master glassblower Robert Dieter Rossbach continues this tradition in Québec, offering a variety of artistic pieces made 100% by hand. Robert Dieter Rossbach is a professional member of the Conseil des Metiers d'art du Québec (CMAQ) since 1996.The Rossbach family guarantees the quality and originality of all their pieces.

The clear choice for sustainable glass

CPS is positioned to be the only patterned solar glass supplier in North America.

Driven by an ambitious vision to add new domestic manufacturing capacity, CPS has initiated plans to build and operate an industry-leading sustainable solar glass manufacturing facility in Manitoba. This facility will play a key role in North America’s rapidly-growing renewable energy sector providing solar module manufacturers with reliable access to high-quality solar glass.

Learn more about what we do
Linkedin
 
Twitter
 
Youtube
Glass is more important than ever

As the world urgently works to reduce emissions, the demand for solar and architectural glass is projected to grow significantly. New policies around the globe, like Canada’s net-zero emissions commitment and the USA’s plan to decarbonize their electrical grid, continue to drive demand to unprecedented heights.

Energy consumption from the electrical grid and energy usage in buildings are significant components of our collective carbon footprint. CPS glass can be used in solar panels – a key component of North American net-zero plans to reduce emissions.

See how we’re helping sustainably fill the supply gap
An opportunity the size of a continent

With 100% of North America’s patterned solar glass currently being imported, the lack of a made-in-North-America solution creates numerous challenges to our future customers. CPS is perfectly positioned to support development of a low-carbon domestic solar supply chain and support the transition to net-zero emissions. This will open up downstream opportunities for complementary businesses, economic growth, and job creation.

Learn about our vision for the future
Right project,
right time,
right place

Manitoba is the ideal location for our facility. We will operate our facility close to our silica deposit, access renewable energy, and utilize some of the world’s most responsibly-sourced natural gas — all at very competitive operating costs. As one of North America’s key shipping hubs, Manitoba provides ready access to markets and efficient shipping options. The project aligns with the Provincial Government’s climate action priorities, sustainable development, job creation targets, and economic growth ambitions.

Contact: INFO@cpsmail.com

WHY CHOOSE TRIMLITE WHEN LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT DOOR?

Operating since 1982 with humble beginnings in Vancouver BC as a manufacturer of decorative glass inserts for steel door fabricators, Trimlite has evolved into a manufacturer and distributor of exterior & interior doors, decorative door glass and millwork products for the building materials industry. Whether you are looking for doorlites, exterior doors accessories, entry doors with glass, modern exterior doors, or interior doors, Trimlite is the one-stop shop for all your door needs.

We pride ourselves in partnering with select vendors who manufacture premium building materials – Simpson Doors, Plastpro, and Cardinal IG to name a few. Our customer base is broad and represents strong relations whether they are door prehangers and distributors, or major steel, fiberglass, and wood door manufacturers.

With glass and stile-and-rail wood door manufacturing facilities in Asia and distribution locations in Canada and the USA, Trimlite strives to provide the best entry doors for sale and glass products in the industry.

Browse our different collections for styles you’ll love, like our interior & exterior doors and modern entry doors.

IRIS fait les choses différemment
Les meilleurs luminaires DEL

Iris Performance est un concepteur et fabricant de solutions d’éclairage DEL de haute performance. Luminaire industriel conçu spécifiquement pour la clientèle canadienne, nos produits sont innovants, fiables et rencontrent les plus hauts standards de performance de l’industrie.

De plus, beaucoup de nos produits sont éligibles au soutien financier des programmes d’efficacité énergétique en vigueur et on les conçoit pour aller chercher le maximum des subventions disponibles. Notre équipe expérimentée comprend l’importance de livrer un projet à temps.

Le retour d’expérience des gens de terrain est important et contribue à l’amélioration de nos produits. Nos solutions se doivent d’être fiables, simples et rapide à installer. Vous ne trouvez pas tout-à-fait ce que vous cherchez et avez besoin d’une solution adaptée, parfait on aime les défis. Parlez-nous de votre projet ça nous intéresse.

L'avantage Écopak

Nous faisons désormais équipe avec l'entreprise Écopak. Nous unissons nos forces afin de vous offrir le meilleur luminaire industriel DEL au monde.

PRODUCT LINES

With Golden Windows, you can reinvent your home and save money by replacing under-performing or drafty windows and doors with new, maintenance-free options. Installing energy efficient windows and doors are an important factor in lowering your home's overall energy bill. Our aluminum, wood, and vinyl windows are vanguards of efficiency and easy maintenance.

Golden Windows manufacture high-quality windows and doors in our Kitchener, Ontario plant. We also partner with trusted suppliers and dealers, professional builders and renovators to ensure you are completely satisfied with your new windows and doors.

Please explore our GoldenClad®, GoldenWood® and GoldenVinyl® product lines for window and door solutions that will best suit your needs.

Visit one of our three showrooms located in Kitchener, London and Kanata.

 




GoldenVinyl® 1000 Series

Our 1000 Series offers a maintenance-free contemporary profile and a wide selection of colours.

Click here to learn more about the 1000 Series.

GoldenClad®

Our GoldenClad product line offers versatililty with a beautiful wood interior and a maintenance free, extruded aluminum-clad exterior for your home. The windows and doors come in 4 available exterior colours with an additional 28 optional colours to choose from. Custom colours are also available.

Click here to learn more.

GoldenWood®

Our GoldenWood® windows are perfect for log homes or to maintain the authenticity of heritage homes. The wood interior and exterior combined with our in-house mill allows you to customize your windows to fit almost any application from gothic windows to custom size double hung windows with a camber sash. The possibilities are endless.

Click here to learn more.

About Golden Windows

In 1961, Golden Windows began as a small Kitchener millwork plant with only a handful of employees under the name Golden Triangle Windows. Although much has changed with window and door innovation over the sixty years Golden Windows has been in operation, we remain a family owned and operated company today.

By focusing on the needs and desires of our customers, Golden Windows has continued to grow and expand into a well known and reputable Canadian window and door manufacturer today. Today, we are an integrated designer, manufacturer and distributor of quality windows and doors servicing Ontario, United States and other international countries such as the Cayman Islands, Great Britain and Japan.

Golden Windows is a reliable source for high quality windows and doors manufactured at our facility in Kitchener, Ontario. We combine a highly skilled, craftsman orientated workforce with the latest technology to produce aluminum, wood and vinyl windows and doors that exceed your need for energy efficiency, natural air flow, easy cleaning and maintenance. This is done by partnering with our suppliers and quality builders, renovators and dealers to satisfy your every need.

By being one of only a few window and door companies that have obtained the ISO 9001 designation, we are able to consistently provide exceptional lead times and on-time delivery of our windows and doors. By believing in a philosophy of continuous improvement, our windows and doors are designed to provide you with trouble-free performance and easy maintenance. We are confident that you will enjoy your Golden Windows for many years to come.

FEATURE STONE
- January 2025 -
Diamond Cream
BY LAMINAM

Introducing Diamond Cream by Laminam. It’s light – it’s fresh – it’s innovative. This ceramic surface is everything you need to inspire a New Year of intentions, including your dream home reno! With a warm, creamy base and a textured, white pattern you can feel, Diamond Cream brings both beauty and tactile appeal to any space. Laminam slabs are also incredibly versatile. From countertops, to fireplaces, to wall cladding and flooring, these ceramic surfaces are suitable for indoor and outdoor applications.

What sets Laminam apart is the large-format, ceramic slabs are crafted with reduced thicknesses and available in a variety of widths to suit any project. Heat and water resistance make these surfaces a standout choice for kitchens, bathrooms, and even swimming pools. For top to bottom design inspiration, check out the elegant and strong Diamond Cream by Laminam!

Packaging the Future of Healthcare

We enable advances in healthcare with packaging that protects product integrity and helps consumers make informed decisions. 

Over a century of partnership across healthcare sectors allows us to continue to develop progressive platforms that respond to evolving pharmaceutical packaging services needs and help our customers put consumer wellness first.

Products & Services

From folding cartons, labels, blistering, pouching, convenience vial filling and secondary packaging to a wide range of specialized medication adherence and dispensing products for pharmacies and long-term care, we offer integrated packaging options with a reputation for outstanding quality and customer support.

SEE OUR PRODUCTS & SERVICES
Who We Are

Jones has been a long-time, trusted partner for some of the most recognized global pharmaceutical and healthcare brands, and the largest pharmacy groups, independent pharmacies, hospitals and long-term care facilities across the world.

From packaging that protects and informs to new platforms that improve consumer outcomes — we are invested in promoting healthcare.

LEARN MORE ABOUT US
Innovation Lab

At Jones, we nurture curiosity with a purpose and innovation based on insight. This has led us to a history of “market-firsts” — and an ongoing commitment to staying ahead of the curve.

From our CpaX™ line of connected, intelligent packaging to the latest in product development, best practice and market leadership, our Innovation Lab showcases how we’re advancing packaging.
